story:
I need your help... I need you to open your hearts and your calendars and find time to support someone close to me... and for many of you, someone you know well.
 
As many of you know when I was down on my luck, back when I was a younger man, and needed a job, Joe of Smokeless Joe's gave me a job with no experience as a server.  He helped me with a job and was extremely kind to me, even when I smashed 10+ cases of beer in the beer fridge one night.  Trained me to be a great server and made sure I had all the best shifts.  I even coached his oldest son to play net in hockey.
 
Joe had some terrible luck lately.  He has recently had to deal with some severe health issues, has lost quite a bit of weight, he is dealing with the finacial burden of being sick, especially since he moved his bar and the renos went 3 times over what he thought they would be.  He has to sleep on a futon in the basement of his restaurant to be close to the hospital, away from his family that lives in Thornhill.  His sons have to stay with their uncle many nights of the week, and Joe's wife has started working in the kitchen to be close to Joe and monitor him.  Joe needs a break!  
 
We are going to give him that break, even if it is for just one day!
 
On April 12th we are going to love bomb his bar Smokeless Joes which is at 488 College St.  We are all going to arrive at his bar around 7:00 and be ready to drink copious amount of beer, and have an amazing night.  Frig if you want to eat lots of food, well that would be great too.  If you owe me a favour, well I am cashing it in and you will come by and have a great night.  This is a night for all of us to get together, have a laugh and raise a glass.
 
This is a celebration of friendship and how awesome Joe is.  He is not looking for pity, he does not want people to know he is sick... this is about support.
 
Please! pass this along to friends and ask them to join you and why they should help.  This is important, this is bigger than all of us!
 
What do you need to do next?  You need to book the night off, and tell me that YOU ARE IN!  This night is a UWO reunion, a Pikes reunion, a work reunion, an ulti kick off. a hockey party, you name it...
 
If you cannnot make it then you can give a donation.  
 
Thank you to everyone for reading this and getting involved.  Forward this to everyone you know and get them involved... do this for me!

story:
UPDATE! Get your Savvy Caps before Christmas!

We will offer the Black Friday-Cyber Monday Savvy Cap 8 pack now through Monday December 2nd, or until they are gone! The 8-pack will be assorted, and feature the designs as shown in the picture below, (with the exception of the Swarovski Crystal Caps) and will include two Glitter Savvy Caps. 


What is a Savvy Cap?

Savvy Cap is a Patent Pending decorative cap that distinguishes your water or soda bottle in a new and clever way. It fits snugly over the existing water or soda plastic bottle cap, gripping it and allowing the cap to operate normally under your Savvy Cap. When you’re finished, you simply remove the Savvy Cap and reuse it over and over.


Why we created Savvy Caps

After years of providing bottled water to guests at our monthly social gatherings, it was clear that the amount of wasted bottled water was far greater than what was actually being consumed. It appeared that guests were drinking half of the water, and leaving behind the half full bottle.

Based on some very unscientific research, we discovered that most of our guests would put their water bottle down, apparently near another bottle which belonged to somebody else. This eventually lead to not being able to decipher which bottle was theirs, subsequently retrieving another one from the cooler.

Savvy Caps was created out of necessity, and ultimately saved many half full bottles of water from being dumped unnecessarily, also saving money and helping the environment at the same time by wasting less bottles and water.

Over 50% of Americans drink bottled water and a lot of that water can be wasted when you find you’re at a party or gathering where more than one person is drinking the same brand of water. How do you identify what bottle is yours?

We Did Our Homework!

After more than two years of research, we finally came up with the perfect solution that is functional, fun and decorative. In the beginning, we used many different materials and sources, hoping to realize a final product that we knew would work with most any size water bottle cap. Finally we have come up with the perfect design, which will work on most any water bottle cap, and will twist it open! No more loosening up the lid first!

Savvy Caps will give you a unique way to identify and individualize a generic bottle of water or soda while adding style at the same time. This will save the party host money, and will add some decorative fun to an ordinary plastic bottle...not to mention helping the environment at the same time by wasting less bottles and water. 
We Need Your Help

If we hit our goal of $10,000, it will make it easier to create the new design mold, and produce over 5,000 caps and packaging for our product. Reaching this goal would help us to get a great start!

How you can help! 

We have many different styles of Savvy Caps that you are sure to love! Pick your reward and enjoy! You can also help by sharing our Indiegogo Campaign page with your friends and family! Thank you so much!!

story:
What is Goatse Mail?

Goatse Mail will offer email addresses on the internet's most awesome domain: Goatse.cx. Users will be able to have their very own @goatse.cx email address using their existing Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail or Outlook.com account.

How Does It Work?

Goatse Mail takes advantage of the relatively little known 'send as' functionality offered by the major webmail providers, including Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail and Outlook.com. 'Send As' allows users to use their existing webmail account (eg. example@gmail.com) to send messages with another email address listed as the sender (eg. example@goatse.cx).

Essentially, you will be able to send, receive and store your @goatse.cx email using your existing Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail or Outlook.com account.

Once you have been allocated your @goatse.cx email account, setting up 'send as' in Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail or Outlook.com takes minutes. Sending email via your integrated email account is as easy as changing the email address in the pull down menu.

In this video I setup the @goatse.cx account in gmail.com and send email in 56 seconds while playing the piano: http://youtu.be/CFY9YsTnMlc

How Much is Goatse Mail?

Each account costs $50 for 10+ years.

What Does '10+ Years' Mean?

I wanted to offer accounts "$50 For Life" but for legal reasons I am unable to offer services "For Life". Instead, it is $50 with a 10 year service and I will then attempt to keep the service going without further charges. Moore's Law will have hopefully reduced the running costs significantly by 2023, and the email forwarding will likely be cheap enough for me to keep the service running in perpetuity. In summary - I have every intention of maintaining this indefinitely but for legal reasons I can only commit to 10 years.

The money pledged will be used to fund the maintenance of the email forwarding service and hopefully pay off the cost of purchasing the domain.

Can I have my picture on Goatse.cx?

Yes you can by choosing the 'Goatse Hall of Fame' Perk. Each picture must be of the dimensions 125X125 pixels. Pictures may be linked to the site of your choice. Pictures will remain on Goatse.cx for at least 10 years. All pictures and links must comply with the .cx (Christmas Island) registry Terms and Conditions. Unfortunately 'hello.jpg' does not comply :(

How Do I Sign Up?

1. Search For Your Name: Go to Goatse Search and search for the name you want. I am updating the database manually, so there is a chance that someone may have already taken that name earlier in the day - this is more likely with a 'popular' name. Search here: http://www.goatse.cx/search/

2. Select 'Perk': Select a Perk from the right side bar.

3. Make Payment: Fill out the information provided and make a payment using either your Credit Card or Paypal.

4. Forward Your Indiegogo Confirmation Email: Forward the Indiegogo confirmation email you receive to accounts@goatse.cx. Please include in the email:

a) Include Your Chosen @Goatse.cx Email: Include the @goatse.cx account names you want (eg. example@goatse.cx). Please select 3 preferences in order to avoid disappointment.

b) Include Your Existing Email Address: The destination account you want it to forward to (eg. example@gmail.com).

c) Include picture / link: Attach 125X125 picture and include a link (Goatse Hall of Fame only).

* Please ensure that you read the terms and conditions prior to any purchase.

How soon do I get my account?

Accounts will be setup manually as soon as possible, I am aiming for within 48 hours of purchase.

Are any names not available?

KirkJ is not available and is reserved for someone very important. I have also restricted names that imply ownership of the site and may confuse people: eg. 'support' and 'admin' etc.

Is Kirk Johnson involved?

Unfortunately Kirk is not involved in this Goatse launch. I have repeatedly attempted to get him on board but he has not responded. It is not easy to find Kirk.

Will emails get flagged as spam?

The domain goatse.cx and associated IP address is not on any known spam blacklists. I have not had any email flagged as spam during my testing of the service.

Why has this taken so long?

Sorry it took a while to get this launched - I wanted to do this properly and provide a service that is comparable to the market leaders - Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Hotmail etc. The obvious option was to use Google Apps to offer Gmail on the domain, but this would have been too expensive ($50 per year per user). Fortunately, I can now offer a service that fully integrates with existing email services. Apologies for the slightly convoluted signup process.

Terms and Conditions

The goatse.cx lawyer has informed us that we need a terms and conditions. Please read them prior to using the service. Goatse.cx is presently not owned or affiliated in any way with Google, Microsoft or Yahoo.

story:
A little over a year ago we decided to open up a bike shop and a cafe in the Bayview/Hunter's Point neighborhood. As neighborhood residents ourselves, we were motivated to provide services we also wanted - reasonably priced bike parts and repairs, and quality coffee and food. The neighborhood has a large collection of fantastic business - some public, some under the radar. We wanted to join that group.

We launched VeloBrews In May of this year and quickly built a contingent of regulars. Most of our startup costs went into building and purchasing for the cafe and food service initially. 
Since then we've learned a lot -both about our community, and what they want. And one thing we've learned is that the community wants and needs a bike shop. Unfortunately we have exhausted most of our resources also supporting the cafe. This puts us in a position where we are finding it increasingly difficult to continue operations.
That's where you come in.
We are looking to raise funds to refocus the business on what you've told us you want - the bike shop. Your contributions will go towards getting the business back on a solid financial footing. In addition it will facilitate some light remodeling in the interior to expand the bike shop space. And last but not least - we've listened and at the top of the priority list will be getting a sign on the front of the building!
We've had an opportunity to find out what our customers need. Now it is time for us to focus our efforts on providing that in the best way possible.

story:
Hi my name is Eric Knapp and I'm a 25 year old student in my final semester at Colorado Mountain College in Glenwood Springs,CO. I moved to Colorado three years ago from Kansas City,MO. I am passionate about storytelling,traveling, and people. 

 

Last summer I purchased a 1982 Volkswagen Westfalia Camper bus for 500$. I lived in the bus all summer and gained a huge appreciation for "car camping". In December 2012, I was on my way back from visiting family in Kansas City. I decided to take highway 36 through western Kansas. With a maximum speed limit of 55 mph, I felt a huge connection to the landscape and people I met along the way. Traveling at a slower pace allowed me to observe more than I would have been able to on a normal interstate route. 

 

Passing through desolate landscapes littered with abandoned equipment and buildings, I had theory that time and change move at a slower pace off the interstate. Growing up the suburbs, I feel I have a unique perspective on overdevelopment and homogenization.  I would like to preserve these places permanently through my photography. I want to travel as far as I can on back highways throughout the American west documenting the people and places along the way.

 

Change happens so fast in this country, these abandoned places are at risk of disappearing. With your help of a little gas money, I can create a book honoring our past and  present perceptions of the American west.

 

I plan to keep an updated photo blog throughout the journey and also produce a hard copy book of the project at the end. I also plan on making a video of the journey.

 

I have all the equipment I need. I can eat on 5 dollars a day. All I need is a little gas money to make this project a reality.

 

The amount of gas money I receive will inevitably determine the length of the project itself but I am completely flexible and can roll with the punches.

 

If you can't contribute money-wise, DON'T WORRY! Just spread the word. Together we can make this journey happen!

story:
Why Does It Matter?

This is the first real 700 square foot house on the first lane to be built at Kalu Yala.  It will use 100% renewable energy, have a full kitchen and five piece bathroom, and sit in its own food forest.  Our Biology, Agriculture, Construction, and Engineering teams are using this first street to write a white paper on how low your carbon footprint can be while living in a beautiful home, in a beautiful town, all at an affordable price.

For every $100 you contribute, you receive $3,000 worth of room nights over the next 20 years or a one-time 4 night stay valued at $600. Both options include meals from Kalu Yala's Public House!

Plus, it's fully furnished and  you can share it with your friends and family!

Just book 30 days in advance through our private booking portal. You're not just getting a vacation spot, you're getting a gift you can keep sharing with people you care about.

Meet your builder, Wes: https://www.instagram.com/west_early/

Check out your wood: http://www.coastecotimber.com/

See our community: http://www.kaluyala.com 

Impact Bonus: For every $2,000 contributed to this campaign, Kalu Yala will provide a full scholarship for a Panamanian student to study sustainability in a field of their choice at our institute.

*Campaign Backers may book the house anytime from 30 days to 1 year prior to their planned visit. All days Perked are transferrable to anyone of your choice every year for 20 years. Major holidays like New Year's Eve will be available one year in advance via lottery available only to Campaign Backers. All fees and maintenance will be covered by renters booking the house when days are available.  The house is 700 square feet. The porch is large and will have two hammocks and a table for 6. The kitchen will have freezer, refrigerator, 4 burner gas range, deep double country style sink and water filtration of our already clean spring water. Queen size bed.  Bathroom with 2 sinks, claw foot tub, flush toilet and outdoor shower.  If more than 300 days of Perks are claimed, we will build another house.

story:
All good things come in threes.

The Bombshells made it to the 2014 WFTDA Championships!

Did you think that the Bombshells were tired of their successes? Far from it, as they want to prove that they are capable of so much more!


After a successful tournament in Fort Lauderdale (Florida), which enabled the first ever continental European Derby team to be able to take part at a WFTDA playoff, we made our way to Kitchener-Waterloo (Ontario). There unbelievably we achieved second place – we won silver!!! As a result of this we qualified for the WFTDA Championships in Nashville (Tennessee).

A variety of teams from both divisions who managed to qualify will meet here. We are one of four teams from Division 2 who were able to qualify to go to Nashville. The best team will be able to rise to the top here. The tournaments in Fort Lauderdale and Kitchener-Waterloo showed that European derby shouldn’t be underestimated. In contrast to our insatiable hunger, our wallets, piggy banks, loan sharks, friends, families, and pawn shops are becoming increasingly sparse. We just about managed to finance our last trip on a tight-rope budget, but this trip we don’t even have a rope to speak of.


Please support us in making our dream a reality.

+++ If you donate more than 20 € you can choose between a team signed unique personal postcard from Nashville, USA or Malmö, Sweden. Every single cent is appreciated! +++

When?

29th October – 3rd November 2014

Where to?

Nashville, Tennessee (USA)

Be there!

Facebook Event

Spread the word!

 #WFTDAChampionships #honeybear #EU4D2 #WFTDAchamps
story_txt:
All good things come in threes.
The Bombshells made it to the 2014 WFTDA Championships!
Did you think that the Bombshells were tired of their successes? Far from
it, as they want to prove that they are capable of so much more!



After a successful tournament in Fort Lauderdale (Florida), which enabled
the first ever continental European Derby team to be able to take part at a WFTDA
playoff, we made our way to Kitchener-Waterloo (Ontario). There unbelievably we
achieved second place – we won silver!!! As a result of this we qualified for
the WFTDA Championships in Nashville (Tennessee).
A variety of teams from both divisions who managed to qualify will meet
here. We are one of four teams from Division 2 who were able to qualify to go
to Nashville. The best team will be able to rise to the top here. The
tournaments in Fort Lauderdale and Kitchener-Waterloo showed that European
derby shouldn’t be underestimated. In contrast to our insatiable hunger, our
wallets, piggy banks, loan sharks, friends, families, and pawn shops are
becoming increasingly sparse. We just about managed to finance our last trip on
a tight-rope budget, but this trip we don’t even have a rope to speak of.


Please support us in making our dream a reality.
+++ If you donate more than 20 € you can choose between a team signed unique personal postcard from Nashville, USA or Malmö, Sweden. Every single cent is appreciated! +++


When?
29th October – 3rd November 2014


Where to?
Nashville, Tennessee (USA)

Be there!
Facebook Event

Spread the word!



 #WFTDAChampionships #honeybear
#EU4D2  #WFTDAchamps

story:
Hello Everyone,

I have qualified for World's Toughest Mudder after completing a Tough Mudder event here in Missouri. This is a huge achievement for me. I really want to go to the world competition, but being a poor college student, I need help. If I make this goal, I'll do another to help with travel. It is a fast turnaround. I have to register and pay the entrance fee my Friday, November 2. I would greatly appreciate your help so I can feel the amazing accomplishment of the great event.

Thanks!!

Topher Blair

story:
THE STORY

Tucked away in an oft forgotten corner of the world, Taitung is a rural city off the east coast of Taiwan with an area just under the size of Rhode Island. While Taitung boasts 10% of the country’s total area, it only accounts for only 1% of its population. Plagued by decades of brain drain and urban flight, Taitung has a population skewed towards the young and the elderly. While the rest of Taiwan has modernized and prospered, Taitung continues to struggle economically.

However, due to this isolation, Taitung has escaped the urbanization in most parts of the country and remains a pristine green idyllic haven that is a reminder of the island’s pre-industrial days. As part of an effort to revitalize the region’s economy, the government has rolled out initiatives in eco-tourism and valued-added agriculture.

 

 

We have identified a crop that offers a glimpse of hope for the region—Taiwan’s version of Kopi Luwak Coffee. Taitung is located on what the coffee world refers to as the “bean belt”, between the Tropic of Cancer and the Tropic of Capricorn, where all the world’s finest beans are grown. Combine that with its natural isolation, moist climate and large mountainous regions (high altitude makes good beans), Taitung presents itself as the perfect location for growing coffee beans.

We met Mr. Ruan in a chanced meeting summer 2012. Mr. Ruan is a Taitung farmer who originally bred Formosan masked civets, the cats that produce the Kopi Luwak taste in coffee. He, along with his cohorts of 11 other famers, were selected by the government to see if they could reinvigorate the coffee industry in Taitung and Taiwan at large.

 

 

After three years’ into the government experiment, Mr. Ruan’s coffee has won accolades from the local press and anyone who has had the good fortune to sip his blend, but of the 1,000 acres of coffee plantation in Taitung County, 80% remain fallow.

As connoisseurs of Mr. Ruan’s coffee, we saw an opportunity to help Mr. Ruan and the people of Taitung better market their products globally and set out on a mission to put their coffee on the map.

 

THE COFFEE

 

Kopi luwak coffee originated from the colonial Dutch Indonesia when farmers discovered that certain species of civets would consume coffee beans and leave them undigested through their systems. Due to the civets selection process (they only eat the best), and the active enzymes in their digestion system react with the beans creating a uniquely original flavor. The most common assessment with our Formosan palm civet Kopi luwak coffee is that it is rich with a chocolate aftertaste and much less bitter than the average coffee.

 

 

The coffee beans in Ruan’s farm are only harvested three months a year, during the months of September, October and November, meaning the civets are only consuming coffee beans during those times of the year.. Averaging 3 to 4 kg of beans per year per civet, Ruan’s farm with 200 civets produces only about 600kg of coffee beans per year.

 

GOAL

Farmers in Taitung have been growing coffee beans since 1912, but like Ruan, though they have perfected their techniques in producing coffee beans worthy of competing with the world’s best, they lack the business skills, means and knowledge to successfully market and distribute their coffee. Breeding and sustaining the civets alone cost up to 24,000 USD a year. My goal is to help Ruan market his coffee by, establishing an online retailing presence where consumers can buy the coffee directly from the Ruans, in short from farm to cup. By allowing farmers and consumers to connect online and bypass the middlemen, we allow consumers to purchase premium coffee more affordably and also allow the farmers to retain a greater share of the revenue.

Your perks will directly help Ruan and farmers like him with the necessities to do what they do best (make awesome coffee) and to promote, package, market, and sell their coffee. Our initial approach is two pronged. Since the farm is very remote—45 minutes by car from Taitung city, we would like to first establish a retail location in downtown Taitung so that visitors can taste Ruan’s coffee and learn about Ruan’s story. At the same time, we would like to expand overseas via the internet, creating greater demand for our products.

In the long term, we hope to empower the area and its local population with the tools for self-sustainability. One of our visions is to transform the farm into an experitential eco-friendly plantation, where visitors can learn about the farming of coffee beans and see the wild civets in their natural habitat.

 

 

Finally, our goal is to stimulate the local economy through entrepreneurship. We hope that through our example, we can encourage more entrepreneurs and investors to invest in the region in a socially responsible way. Where possible, we are committed to hiring locally from the 200,000+ community in Taitung and training them with the skills necessary to build a small, yet global business. By hiring local staff and basing the company in Taitung, we want to keep as much of the salary and earnings earned through this venture recycled and reinvested into the community.

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

The greatest risk lies in the fact that coffee bean production is still a nascent industry in Taiwan and the accompanying ecosystem, e.g. logistics, experienced marketers, growers, etc. remain underdeveloped or few. As a result, initially the unit cost per pound of coffee may not be competitive in price to what consumers globally find acceptable. In addition, consumers unfamiliar with Taiwan may not be ready to associate premium coffee with Taiwan and be reluctant to purchase.

So, it might be a while till you see our coffee in Whole Foods or your local cafe, but we are prepared to win over one consumer at a time because to us, this is not just another cup of joe, but a social responsibility.

 

OUR PERKS

Apart from our Kopi Luwak Coffee, Ruan has spent years developing a “simulated” blend, where he has attempted to enzymatically duplicate the taste of Kopi Luwak. Unlike Kopi Luwak, where the coffee beans are consumed by the civets, the simulated Kopi Luwak treats the coffee beans enzymatically to replicate the Kopi Luwak taste. We have coined the blend, Ecolique (or eco-friendly) beans.

 

 

Our perks come in 3 different packages: The Ecolique have been pre-grounded as drip coffee filter bags to be included in all but one of our pledges. With increasing pledges, you will receive increasing amounts of Ecolique and Taitung Kopi Luwak. All of which will be shipped free of charge anywhere in the world!

story:
Revolutionary Luggage With Built-in Shelves

Now in 3 New Sizes!


Raise your travel game.

ShelfPack combines the portability of a suitcase with the organization and convenience of a dresser.

Packing is easy. Simply arrange your gear on the shelves, drop them into the case, zip and go. When you get to your destination, just unzip, lift the shelves and your clothes are visible and easy to get at. No more rifling or wrinkling.

The unique standing lid has 3 easy-access pockets, like handy drawers.
 

 

 

Best Seller — 28"

The new 28” model is the upgraded version of our original. It has larger pockets, 4 spinner wheels and other improvements.

This generously sized model takes the greatest advantage of the shelves and pockets and keeps all your gear perfectly organized and easy to access. Ideal for multiple-person and/or multiple-day trips.
28" x 18.5" x 14" (including wheels), 14.5 lbs.

The original model sold for $349. With our new larger factory order we're planning to get the MSRP down to $299.

If you back this campaign now you can get it for only $209 (or less if you're an early-bird)!.


 

Weekender — 24”

Our mid-size ShelfPack features the same unique design, features and functionality as the larger model, but in a more compact size. Ideal for weekend getaways for 1 or 2 people.
24" x 16" x 12" (including wheels), 11.5 lbs

MSRP $259. Get yours now for only $189 (or less if you're an early-bird!).


The Perfect Carry-on — 21”

Conforms to all airline size restrictions for carry-on luggage. The lift-out shelves can be hung on any closet bar. The bottom shelf is detachable if you’re not carrying as much. Includes a laptop sleeve in the lid.
21" x 14" x 9" (including wheels), 8.2 lbs

MSRP $249. Get yours now for only $188 (or less if you're an early-bird!).

 

  • All units include 4 spinner wheels for easy maneuverability.
  • The carry-on includes an easy-access laptop sleeve!

 

  • The 28" and 24" models include hooks you can attach to the top of the shelves so you can hang them on a closet bar.


Note: Slight variations in dimensions may occur in final production.
Luggage stand and clothes rack not included.

 



 

The Shelves and Pockets Make Organization Simple

  • Arrange pants on 1 shelf, shirts on another, etc.
  • If you are traveling multiple days, arrange each day's clothing on a different shelf.
  • If multiple people are traveling, each person can get their own shelf.
  • The case below the bottom shelf is accessible and is a handy place to stash laundry.


ShelfPack is Perfect For:

  • Family Travel
  • Business Travel
  • Cruises
  • Camping
  • Road Trips
  • Even Home Storage!


Here's a smart family on vacation with the ShelfPack:

Traveling with multiple people can be a real challenge. ShelfPack makes it easy and fun.

 

 


 

  



"This clever suitcase is basically a closet on wheels."
 


“The collapsible shelving unit keeps everything visible and in its place.”
 


“Is this the best suitcase ever?”



“A new suitcase just solved all of your travel problems.”



“This excellent suitcase folds out into a dresser.”


“ShelfPack is a suitcase with built-in shelves.”


“Brilliant: ShelfPack is the suitcase for those who, well, live out of a suitcase.”
 


“ShelfPack promises to revolutionize the way you pack for travel.”



“This perfect suitcase turns into a portable dresser.”



“This genius suitcase will revolutionize the way you pack when traveling.”
 


“This luggage with built-in shelves will change your travel game.”



“This company’s carry-on solves a very common problem for travelers.”




 

CBS’ The Price is Right


ABC’s FABLife


CNN's Wandermusts

 

 

"This is one neat suitcase, easy to pack, the folding shelves keep things in place and well organized."
                                  – GLENN

"This suitcase is AMAZING! I travel domestic and international. Many times I work trade shows and I use this for quick set up of my "office" area. Pop up and instant work space! When I use in my hotel room, it helps keep all things tidy and easy to reach. Often the hotel trips I make are 1 day here, 1 day there, and this case makes Living out of a suitcase a lot more bearable. It is made very well and I will be purchasing another very soon to be able to use 2 per trip. Saves time, sanity and just plain Smart!"
                                 – KELLY

"I just used the case and was very pleased. I want to buy another one."
                                  – OMER

"I can’t tell you the frustration this piece of luggage has saved me on my first vacation with it."
                                  – JOSH

"OMG I LOVE THIS CASE!!!! I just got back from my trip and it worked great!! I LOVE IT!! Congrats on this Awesome invention!"
                                  – KELLIE

"I love your product. I recently had to fly a 4 day trip to Australia for a family wedding (3 formal outfits, plus heels, plus my boyfriend's suit, etc.) This luggage saved me so much effort packing and unpacking. For once, I'm organized! Truly a miracle. Anyway, people in my family have put in requests for ShelfPack as a Christmas present."
                                  – CLEO

"Ken, I would just like to let you know that I just received my ShelfPack...And it is ausom [sic]!"
                                    – DIANNE

AND MANY MORE!

 

 

 

...to get this revolutionary luggage. We could not produce the original ShelfPack model fast enough to keep up with demand.

And at the higher volume we're able to reduce the retail price, but if you choose one of these great perks you'll get even bigger savings!

We're very excited about and honored by the recognition ShelfPack has received and all the praise from the press, reviewers and customers. ShelfPack has made a splash in the luggage market and is changing the way people travel.
 

There hasn't been a major innovation in luggage like this since rolling luggage was introduced in the 1980s.
 

Please choose a perk and help bring the next generation into production, and change the way you travel!
 

International shipping:

We've recently added perks with international shipping for each model. If your destination is outside the US, Canada and EU, please choose the "International shipping" perk for the model you want. Once you are ready to check out it will show your shipping cost.

If there is enough interest from other regions we can research ways to make it available at a reasonable cost.

If you are in other regions, please fill out this short online survey so we can estimate the demand.  If you enter your email in the survey we'll send you updates when new regions are available.

Click here for the ShelfPack international shipping survey.
 

Delivery timeline and risks:

ShelfPack has been in production since 2015 and thousands have been shipped to customers. Production, shipping, fulfillment and customer support are all well established.

All ShelfPacks have a limited lifetime warranty. We've had an exceptionally low defect and damage rate.

We have engaged an international quality-control firm to perform multiple inspections before and during production. This will ensure the factory is a safe work environment and each unit meets our quality standards.

The factory has given conservative estimates that the initial order, up to 5,000 units, will take 60 days to complete. Shipping containers to the US and other regions should take 15 days and shipping to you 2 to 5 days. This campaign will end on July 4 so all perks should get to you late October. There is a possibility that if some units are completed early they will be shipped out ahead of schedule.

There can be unexpected delays with any of the efforts getting the products made and to you, but all time estimates have been double-checked and there are multiple alternatives to each of the services that we can switch to if problems arise.

I will send regular updates to all backers with progress reports.

story:
The World Cup

The International Quidditch Association's World Cup is the world's premier quidditch event, where teams from the IQA's member nations compete for the title of World Champion. 

This campaign is part of the World Cup Expansion Fund, an initiative designed to increased participation from emerging areas on the international stage. What does that mean? 

  1. All the funds raised in this campaign (up to €1500) will be matched by the IQA, effectively doubling the amount raised!
  2. The team will struggle to attend the event without the support of this campaign. 
  3. The international scope of the tournament will be vastly improved by the attendance of the team.
Team Uganda

Team Uganda is the only African team registered to compete at the event, and consequently is an excellent recipient of the fund. John Ssentamu, the Chairman of Quidditch Uganda, has been working tirelessly for the past two years to help Uganda attend the World Cup, but now they need your support!

  • Team Uganda need an eye-watering amount of money in order to attend the World Cup, nearly €15,000! Every penny will go directly towards helping them get to the tournament. Lets make it happen!
  • There are some awesome perks available for supporting Team Uganda, including T-Shirts, Postcards, Stickers and Jerseys! 
  • If you live in Europe or America, the international financial system is on your side! One Euro is equivalent to nearly 4000 Ugandan Shillings, where the average hourly salary in Uganda  is 1200 Shillings. 

NEW PERKS


Why is it important?

Up to this point, most international quidditch teams have been from western countries - Europe and North America. With this campaign, we have a real chance to broaden the spectrum of teams attending the event, attracting more media attention and ushering in a new age of development for the sport.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, that's okay! Please share this campaign on all your social media platforms and keep an eye out for our support campaigns.
story_txt:
The World Cup The International Quidditch Association's World Cup is the world's premier quidditch event, where teams from the IQA's member nations compete for the title of World Champion. 
This campaign is part of the World Cup Expansion Fund, an initiative designed to increased participation from emerging areas on the international stage. What does that mean? 


All the funds raised in this campaign (up to €1500) will be matched by the IQA, effectively doubling the amount raised!
The team will struggle to attend the event without the support of this campaign. 
The international scope of the tournament will be vastly improved by the attendance of the team.


Team Uganda

 Team Uganda is the only African team registered to compete at the event, and consequently is an excellent recipient of the fund. John Ssentamu, the Chairman of Quidditch Uganda, has been working tirelessly for the past two years to help Uganda attend the World Cup, but now they need your support!  Team Uganda need an eye-watering amount of money in order to attend the World Cup, nearly €15,000! Every penny will go directly towards helping them get to the tournament. Lets make it happen! There are some awesome perks available for supporting Team Uganda, including T-Shirts, Postcards, Stickers and Jerseys! 
If you live in Europe or America, the international financial system is on your side! One Euro is equivalent to nearly 4000 Ugandan Shillings, where the average hourly salary in Uganda  is 1200 Shillings.  










NEW PERKS






Why is it important? Up to this point, most international quidditch teams have been from western countries - Europe and North America. With this campaign, we have a real chance to broaden the spectrum of teams attending the event, attracting more media attention and ushering in a new age of development for the sport.
Other Ways You Can Help
 If you can't donate, that's okay! Please share this campaign on all your social media platforms and keep an eye out for our support campaigns.

story:
SWIFT is the best bag we’ve ever created. It allows you to pack, unpack and access all your stuff effortlessly, and the user experience is seamless and joyful. All utilities are highly integrated into its unique form design which is light and compact, yet durable enough to survive your daily adventures.

 

Pack & Unpack in a Second | Prompt Access from All Directions!

 

 

 

  • Loading up your bag through the tiny opening one by one
  • Searching for compartments through the bag, seeking for more space
  • Checking what's already inside since you can't see them clearly
  • Rummaging a lot since your stuff has been gone all the way down to the bottom
  • Don't know where your items exactly are

These are what people doing every day, ending up wasting so much time per day! What we truly want is a bag which is so simple and intuitive, allowing us to pack and unpack in no time.

 

 

That's why we made SWIFT a bag that we could easily open it up and lie it flat with only one zipper, to save your time from packing every day!

 

 

We also believe that the accessibility is the name of the game. You could access all your belongings without limits since the zipper has divided the SWIFT into 2 parts and make it accessible from all direction, to allow you have more fun instead of rummaging through bags at all times!

 

 

It is made for urban explorers and outdoor adventurers with the uniqueness of functionality and beauty. It will be the best companion on your next journey!

 

Check out the Sneak Peek of SWIFT Bag!

 

 

 

 

 

Let's See What's Inside a SWIFT!

 

The SWIFT System inside SWIFT Bag is a total solution allowing you to pack & unpack in a second, and to reach all your belongings from various directions in no time, highly integrated into the whole-bag design. Built with purpose, the SWIFT pack is light, functional, and is jam-packed with essential features that make it the perfect addition to all your adventures.

 

Pack & Unpack in a Second with the "ZigZag" Zipper 

 

 

This continuous one-zipper makes SWIFT so unique in both form & function. It could be fully unzipped, making SWIFT to lie flat, allowing you to pack & unpack in the blink of an eye.

 

One Pull to Lie Flat!

 

Prompt Access from All Directions

 

The Z-shaped design divides the SWIFT Bag into 2 parts  that allow you to access everything from the top to the bottom, and from the right to the left.

 

Get your stuff in the blink of an eye!

 

2 Access Wings & Zippered Mesh Pockets

 

 

Best way to access your gadgets!  These 2 wings with internal pockets will perfectly hold your belongings. Every time you unzip the SWIFT, you could reach your stuffs so easily with either your left or right hand in no time.

 

Everything in Its Right Place! 

 

Isolated Dry Layer: Double Dry Compartment

 

 

The built-in drawstring bag provides an isolated compartment for you to store laundry, shoes, private belongings or even the groceries you bought!

 

A Separate Space for Better Organization!

 

Pockets & Sleeve for Better Organization

     

     

    From the outside to the inside, there are pockets and a sleeve within SWIFT to keep everything well organized!

    • Elastic Side Pockets: These mesh pockets will hold your bottles, umbrellas, and towels, keeping them reachable even when the SWIFT Bag is on the back.
    • Top Pocket:It's perfect for sunglasses, coins or tickets, anything you will frequently take out.
    • Internal Sleeve: Fits your 10" tablet, documents, books or magazines.

     

    Rummage Less, Save Your Time Everyday!

     

    23L Voluminous Storage

     

     

    The SWIFT Bag's main compartment provides enough space to fit all your everyday essentials, yet it's still easy to carry and makes you mobile during your journey.

     

    Foldable to Carry
     

     

    SWIFT could be folded into a compact size which is easy to carry for travellers and adventurers. Bring a SWIFT within your luggage, it will be your perfect companion in the journey when you're about to start a tour and you want to travel light!

     

    Bring SWIFT , and Travel Light Everywhere!

     

     

    Ergonomic Packing System

     

     

    There are many details that help to build the most comfortable backpacking experience when using SWIFT. Maximum Fit and Comfort!

    • Adjustable Shoulder Straps: Stability straps keep SWIFT be worn high on the back
    • Adjustable Sternum Strap: Provide reduced jarring and tumbling of SWIFT.
    • Breathable Mesh Straps: Breathable and comfortable, specially designed for a wild trip.

     

     

    Ultra Light, Like a Feather

     

     

    To make SWIFT  the lightest bag you could travel comfortably while taking everything you need, we use ultra light yet durable material, keeping weight at minimum.

     

    No Burdens, Only Adventures


    Splash & Dust Resistant Coating

     

     

    Made with 100% Waterproof Material: The main 23L compartment is completely splash resistant and doubles as a dry sack.

     

    Dry and Clean at All Time!

     

    Anti-Theft Zipper Pull Lock

     

     

    We found the most intuitive and simplest way to secure your valuables in the SWIFT. Lock your zipper pull up and keep it secured at all times.

     

    See? You could travel in confidence with SWIFT!

     

     

     

     
     
     

     

    Slim, Smart, Stylish. That’s how SWIFT is.

     

     

    SWIFT's versatile style makes them perfect for everyone to do anything, go anywhere,
    no matter in urban or outdoor situation.

    Easy to Pack & Unpack | Prompt Access | Organized & Comfortable| Light & Durable

     

    Who Fits the SWIFT ?

     

     

    The SWIFT comes with everything you need to pack, carry, store, unpack, grab and enjoy your outdoor activities, commuting and travel no matter what kind of role you play in everyday life.

    Sportsman 

    The SWIFT allows you to carry clean clothes, sneakers or wet clothes together in one bag but separate in each pocket and sleeve.

    Shutterbug

    It provides prompt access from all directions when you need to take out the tripod or change the lens. You won't miss the perfect shot again!

    Daytripper

    The SWIFT's  versatile style allows people to go out light and relax with your sport cloth or shoes. The light weight and compact usage for people can pack and unpack the bag easily, saving your time, getting more time on the journey.

     

     

     

     

     

    • Material: 68D Honeycomb Polyester with Water & Dust Resistant Surface Treatment
    • Weight: 300 Grams (10.6 Ounces)
    • Packing Mode Size: 55 cm (19.7") x 28 cm (11") x 7.9cm()
    • Flat Bag Mode Size: Φ 19 cm  (7.5") x 60 cm (23.6")
    • Color Options: Gun Black, Moon Grey and Navy Blue.

     

     

    The SWIFT bag comes in Gun Black, Moon Grey and Navy Blue!

     

     

    The more SWIFT you back at once, the better discount you will get! So don't be shy to share with your lover, friends and family about SWIFT bag! We got exclusive options for you only on INDIEGOGO! 

     

     

     

    We are working with experienced supply chain professionals to ensure that we get high quality products in a timely manner. And of course, we will keep you updated of any progress! 

     

     

     

     

    TRONNOVATE DESIGN LABORATORY INC. is founded in 2014, working on design and idea-creation. Our team is based in Tainan, Taiwan, in the lovely city treat us, move and inspire us. Every product is made through our eyes, hearts, and behaviors. TRONNOVATE devotes to add more design to our environment by those simplest ways, and let our life more cheerful and nature. Design for the better life.

     

     

    ​With more than US$109,554 raised and 2,383 backers' support, this is our 5th campaign on the crowdfunding platform. In brief, TRONNOVATE is with good reputation and keeps their product with highest quality, 

    For more information, please check the following link: 

     

     

     

    Frequently Asked Questions

     

    What is the Volume of the SWIFT?

    The SWIFT will hold up to 23L at full capacity.

    What is the weight of the SWIFT?

    The weight of the sling empty (with the strap) is 300 grams.

    Is the SWIFT 100% waterproof?

    The SWIFT is water repellent, but not waterproof.

    This means that in normal rain conditions, you should be safe and all your items will stay dry. However, the bag is not intended to protect your valuables when thrown in a pool, body of water or to be in a full rain pour for about an hour.

    Is the SWIFT washing machine proof?

    The SWIFT is not washing machine proof. However, since the whole bag is covered with water repellent material, the sling is already better protected against dirt and stains attaching to the fabric.
    Furthermore, it is easily washable with a wet cloth or wipes.

    What are the shipping costs?
    Shipping varies from different items you perk. There is just a small surcharge applied at checkout. Simply click on the perk, you will automatically see what the shipment costs are.

    What payment methods do you accept?

    For this project, we can only accept payment by Credit Card, no other payments methods.
    If there is a problem with the payment with your CC, please contact the customer support team of Indiegogo, as they are in charge of collecting the payments.

    Will I have to pay duties/VAT to receive my order?

    We will do all we possibly can to prevent this from happening, but any applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer.

    We have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged in your country. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your perk, please get in touch with your local post office.

    There is also a handy tool online available to calculate these costs. Please note that this is an external online partner, so we cannot be held accountable for differences between the actual cost and what is mentioned on this website: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a....

    The bags will be shipped from Taiwan, this will help you to calculate the costs.

    Can I get a refund if I change my mind?

    For InDemand backers, Indiegogo has a 10 day period that allows backers to cancel their orders. After this period and for original campaign backers, please contact kuni@tronnovate.com for more discussion.

    Where can I fill in my delivery address?

    During the end of campaign, we will send out a survey to our backers. In this survey, we will collect all the necessary data such as your delivery address.
    We will also send out an email to all backers right before we will send out all the packages to make sure this delivery address is still up to date.

    Will we receive a tracking number for our shipment?

    All backers will receive a personal tracking number with which they can trace their shipment.

    Can I pay extra to get an earlier delivery?

    This is unfortunately not possible. It is not a matter of extra costs, but a matter of making sure that we ship out all the bags in the most efficient way as possible. However, there will be 200 sling bags (grey only) available for early delivery if you pledge for the Super Early Bird reward.

    Unfortunately, we cannot make exceptions to this process as it will delay all the other shipments.

    Can I pick up my delivery?

    This is unfortunately not possible; our entire delivery process is automated to create as much efficiency as possible. This in order to make sure that all backers will receive their package on time (or even earlier than expected). A manual pick-up will disrupt this process and is therefore not possible.

story:
When Nick is cold, everyone is miserable.

Hi, my name is Travis Toon.  I've spent a lot of time with Nick and the family over the last couple years.  It's bad enough putting up with the kid's antics and Nick and Idena's smart mouths, but if you've ever been in the same room or car with Nick in the winter you know what suffering is like.  Since Nick doesn't generate body heat in the same way a lot of other folks do, he has to compensate by raising the external temperature.  Methods for this include barking at the boys to put more and more logs on the fire, and leaving the car heater on full blast.  This often means his living room and car stay at around 100 degrees, which is nice if you just took a cold shower. 

Nick is also an avid hunter, especially for deer, turkey, and morels.  He's an outdoor enthusiast in general.  Keeping him cooped up all winter makes him particularly cranky and unpleasant to be around.  It doesn't seem to matter how well insulated he is when he goes outside in the cold, there is not enough body heat for him to stay warm.   This means either the hunting trips end prematurely or he gets some seriously tight muscles in the neck and back.  Either way, anybody within yelling distance is going to pay.

Let's get Nick a heated suit so he'll stop his bitchin' and get on with it.  I expect he'll wear the thing pretty much all winter and we'll all benefit.

Warm and Safe, Inc

The good folks at Warm and Safe, Inc make heated suits for insane motorcycle tourists - the kind that choose to "tour" Canada and Russia in the off season.  Warm and Safe invented the first heated motorcycle suits many years ago.  They had been thinking about making a 24-volt system for wheelchairs but just never got around to it.  In 2011 I started bugging them about it so much that they decided it would take less time to develop a new product than put up with the constant nagging.   After a couple years of testing and patent bureaucracy it is finally ready.  Nick is set to be the very first owner in history of a 24-volt manufactured heated suit. 

Here's the cost breakdown:

  1. $199.95 Jacket Liner
  2. $185.95 Pants Liner
  3. $79.95 Glove Liners
  4. $69.95 Socks
  5. $99.95 Dual Adjustable Controller (custom temperature controls for pants/socks and jacket/gloves)

That  comes to a total of $635.75.  These are the same prices as the regular 12-volt motorcycle versions.

Here's a PDF version of the order.

story:
How do you get that delicate shirt or slik dress clean without deforming or color fading, especially during travelling or business trip? For delicate clothing, the washing machine is just too rough to do the job, and hand-washing will finish up leaving a great deal of bacteria behind. Moreover, these traditional laundry ways will cause chemical residue on clothing as well as water pollution. All of these were troubles until the coming of WASHWOW 3.0.  It is going to change the way that people think about doing laundry.

  •  Clean 

With the electrolysis of water, WASHWOW 3.0 can assist to very easily and quickly eliminate organic stains from clothing.  With it to clean your business and casual wearing in a high-tech gentle way, you can relax and say good-bye to clothes deforming or discoloration. All kinds of delicate fabrics are tested to be safe from any damage, including silk, lace, cotton, linen and so on.  

  • Disinfect

Don’t just clean your clothes, disinfect them! This gadget has a sterilization rate as high as 99.98% ! Just by using water in the electrolysis technique, WASHWOW 3.0 is able to disinfect even the most delicate article of clothing from within. 

  • No Need For Laundry Detergents

This high-powered disinfecting gadget breaks water down into hydrogen and oxygen gas which can decompose organic stains on your clothes without using any detergent or additive.  

  • Remove Chemical Residue

Excess chemical residue in your clothes, from using detergent and softener, serves as a way for bacteria to expand.  WASHWOW 3.0 can effectively remove excess chemical residues from clothes, so this is no longer a problem.  

  •  Eliminate Odor 

No matter whether there is sweat smell on the armpits of shirts, damp smell on used towels or socks stink, WASHWOW 3.0 can effectively eliminate any odor. In just 30 minutes of using this product, clothes will end up clean and odor-free. 

  • Easy to Carry 

Weighing in at just 106g/0.23lbs, finished in a compact design perfect for taking with you on the road, WASHWOW 3.0 is the perfect solution for frequent travelers, over packers, and anyone looking to reduce their environmental footprint.  

  •  Business Traveler:  

WASHWOW 3.0 can help you from hassle of laundry during business trip. Simply place it in your carry-on bag and take it onto plane.  

  • Mother & Baby: 

With WASHWOW 3.0, your baby or child's garments will be washed with appropriate care. 

  • Fitness Fan 

No worry about sweat smell, just enjoy your workout!

  • Backpacker

With WASHWOW 3.0, you are able to clean clothes with just water and bank power while camping.

Best of all, WASHWOW 3.0 isn't limited to laundry.  

Use it sanitize dishes, or disinfect vegetable and fruit etc. It can effective remove chemical residue on vegetable and fruit. 

The working principle of WASHWOW 3.0 is to use the reactive oxygen species which generated by electrolysis of water to decompose organic stains on clothes. The machine interior is coated with noble metal which can create positive and negative electrodes. The components OH, O, O2, O3, On, HnOn can decompose the organic dirt into water and carbon dioxide or others, and hypochlorous acid has antibacterial effect to make bacteria and dust mites not attach to clothes. 

There is alkaline ionic at the cathode end during water electrolysis, to create an environment like having detergent but better effect, the metallic oxide, lipids and some residual chemical components in the wastewater are oxidized and discomposed accordingly. Also, there is acid iron on the anode end to achieve the effect of sterilization and deodorization combined functions.  

 

 

Step 1: Put your clothes into water.

Step 2: Plug WASHWOW 3.0 to AC power via USB cable. Turn WASHWOW 3.0 on by pressing the button on the surface. 

Step 3: Place WASHWOW 3.0 into water.

Step 4: After 30 minutes, rinse your clothes and then hang them out to dry.

Kindly notice: It needs to be plugged into AC via USB cable while washing. The package includes a bundled USB cable (0.8 meters in length) and a USB extenstion cable (1.5 meters in length). NO plug included.  Here are three ways for reference:

Please connect WASHWOW 3.0 with AC power via USB cable and your own mobile phone plug.

Please connect WASHWOW 3.0 with a power bank via USB cable.

Pleaes plug WASHWOW 3.0 into USB power socket via USB cable.

WASHWOW 3.0 has been successfully funded HK$ 330,749 with 421 backers on Kickstarter June 22th 2019. Click Here to view Kickstarter Project.

 

We have tested and redesigned this many times and finally can provide you with something we are proud of. Still, creating WASHWOW is a complex process. Each specimen has its own unique challenges and the scale of the project may also lead to unexpected delays. We've taken every step possible to mitigate potential issues. We plan to provide detailed and timely project updates to keep backers advised, informed, educated, and at times entertained. 
Our mission is to renovate the way people wash and disinfect clothes, to make it easier and more natural, anywhere and anytime. So back us today and end the annoying problems with laundry once and for all.

 

If you like WASHWOW, you could share our project to your friends in order to make their life easier during travelling. Thanks for your support, we will keep on going and making more innovative gadgets.
story_txt:

For delicate clothing, the washing machine is just too rough to do the job, and hand-washing will finish up leaving a great deal of bacteria behind. Moreover, these traditional laundry ways will cause chemical residue on clothing as well as water pollution. All of these were troubles until the coming of WASHWOW 3.0.  It is going to change the way that people think about doing laundry. Clean With the electrolysis of water, WASHWOW 3.0 can assist to very easily and quickly eliminate organic stains from clothing.  With it to clean your business and casual wearing in a high-tech gentle way, you can relax and say good-bye to clothes deforming or discoloration. All kinds of delicate fabrics are tested to be safe from any damage, including silk, lace, cotton, linen and so on.  DisinfectDon’t just clean your clothes, disinfect them! This gadget has a sterilization rate as high as 99.98% ! Just by using water in the electrolysis technique, WASHWOW 3.0 is able to disinfect even the most delicate article of clothing from within. No Need For Laundry DetergentsThis high-powered disinfecting gadget breaks water down into hydrogen and oxygen gas which can decompose organic stains on your clothes without using any detergent or additive.  Remove Chemical ResidueExcess chemical residue in your clothes, from using detergent and softener, serves as a way for bacteria to expand.  WASHWOW 3.0 can effectively remove excess chemical residues from clothes, so this is no longer a problem.   Eliminate Odor No matter whether there is sweat smell on the armpits of shirts, damp smell on used towels or socks stink, WASHWOW 3.0 can effectively eliminate any odor. story:
I was nicknamed Ocean many years ago because of my love of the water and everything about it. I took Marine Technician courses at CFCC which included boat handling and water rescue,among other things. I'm an avid bodyboarder, teach surfing along with weather,wave knowledge,and what lives in the ocean. I've ridden waves as large as 20 feet or so by paddling across a sharky inlet and then close to a mile out to sea. I competed in many bodyboarding contests, and worked as an Emergency Medical Technician at most of those contests. Red Bull held a contest called Project Swell which I entered and came in 4th overall and 2cd in the southern division. The ultimate goal of the contest was to decide when the wave size was right to run the Red Bull Icebreak surf contest. We had to turn in two forecasts per week by 7pm. My job was  forecasting for New York. We had to include wave size, a write up, our sources,and more. If they weren't on time, they didn't count. The top ten of us received a surf practicum from Surfline surf Forecasters. We got much more than that which I won't go into. I'll just put it this way, it was epic! As a bonus, I was the only person who wasn't in a weather program at a university. Weather has always been in my blood,thanks to my dad being a forecaster. He was thrilled about me being a winner and he's really excited about me doing this race.

At this point in my life, I'm seeking bigger goals and challenges. I've gotten to know Shawn Alladio of K38 Water Rescue and she is going to train me for this race and supply all the gear I need, including a new Kawasaki Ultra jet ski. My goal is to complete the race, make some good contacts, and work toward getting water safety and rescue more prevalent on the east coast, and maybe even get into this. The race is also a huge undertaking for me. I was sick for a couple of years and during that time I didn't get to surf or really LIVE. I was alive, just not really present. I also had left shoulder surgery during that time. I've been back in the water for about 2 years now and I'm right back to making big drops, doing airs, and getting barreled. Totally stoked to bodyboard again!  Acupuncture gave me life back. I'm still not 100%, yet I have the drive to push on and believe that I can do anything! This is an amazing opportunity for me that I can't pass up and it would be an honor if you would help me complete this mission. 

At this juncture, I need $800 to help fund the trip which includes the $250 entry fee, and pay a couple of bills before I go. I'm staying with Shawn Alladio and going out a few days early so she can train me. We are going to go out to Catalina so I can get familiar with the waters and the ski. 

The LBCATRace is on July 20th and I'm flying out on July 16th for my training. The race won't be easy and I've been working out like a fiend to get stronger and will continue to do so until I leave. I want this so bad that I can taste it. I love to learn new things and take on challenges. They motivate me to do more and I've always liked helping people so water rescue is right up my alley. This may lead to that or more racing or both. It will lead to something bigger and better for me. If I don't reach my entire goal, I will still manage to make the trip. For those of you know me well; I will continue to help animals like always. Nothing will get in the way of that. Again, this is an opportunity that I must not let get away from me. I feel confident even knowing there could be rough seas and I haven't spent any time in CA. There is a sense of peace though that feels good. Visualizing is helping me focus on the goal and big life changes.

If you can't or don't want to help, it's all good. You can always back me in spirt!

story:
Why Downtown Scuba Diving in Houston?

It’s the perfect unique date. 
It’s a great way to fight childhood obesity.
It’s an exciting antidote to a boring fitness routine. 
It’s Houston’s next big chance at bragging rights. 

It’s scuba diving in downtown Houston. 

Stay with us.

Bayou City Adventures is all about bringing affordable outdoor activities to Houston, and we have the track record to prove it. 

We pioneered kayaking at Discovery Green, where you don a life jacket, take a quick lesson, then paddle around the pool by the bases of the skyscrapers. (Don’t even get us started on kayak polo.)

We also host Houston’s safest, most affordable bicycle sight-seeing tour, where you can see the city from the seat of a beach cruiser.

Our kayak bayou tour helped make kayaking mainstream in Houston, and our popular surfing classes have novice surfers up on boards in no time.  

Bayou City Adventures gets the people of Houston off the couch and into the outdoors in fresh ways. We are always inventing new activities for you to do with friends, neighbors, and family, which leads us to...

Our newest adventure: Downtown scuba diving.

Help Us Bring Scuba Diving to Downtown Houston
This is a campaign to launch an Introduction to Scuba Diving class right at Houston’s beautiful Discovery Green park. Almost everyone is curious about scuba diving, but people afraid try it because they of safety concerns, or because they’re nervous about what’s swimming in the ocean around them. 

We know how to make your first scuba diving experience fun and totally painless. In the Intro class, we will teach beginners to dive in a controlled environment, in clear water with fish. 

And yes, we will provide the gear.

Scuba diving has several health benefits, the best being that it’s so much fun you’ll forget it’s actually exercise. 

What We Need & What You Get

Your donations will help cover the cost of scuba gear, permits, operating and insurance fees, initial startup fees, advertising, staff training, and  transportation.

Why is scuba diving valuable to Houston? Houston is one of the best U.S. cities because there are so many unique forms of entertainment here. No other U.S. city offers scuba diving in a major downtown park. We will be the first! 

It’s the perfect physical activity for anyone who is bored with traditional exercise. Office workers, healthcare professionals, schoolchildren, and other people who are stuck indoors every day will get the chance at a scuba adventure every week. 

If you like the experience--and we’re pretty sure you’re going to love it-- we can offer excursions to the ocean as well.  

We want to launch as soon as the cool weather breaks, so... April of 2014.

Can’t Donate Today? Here’s How You Can Help:

Spread the word. We think the people of Houston would LOVE the chance to try downtown scuba diving, so use those share buttons to help us tell them about it! Use Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Instagram. We like them all!

Thanks for reading about us. We’ll see you at Discovery Green this spring!

story:
I'm writing a book and YOU can be part of it!

Hey there, thanks for visiting! My name is Hook...I am a musician, writer, adventurer, amateur photographer/videographer, nature-lover, and vegan. I am writing a book and YOU can be a part of it!

 

Incorporating my love of nature, writing, photography, and this wondrous and gorgeous country, I am embarking on a cross-country camping trek which I will document in my fabulous vegan-on-a-budget travel guide. With limited budget and resources, I will discover and recommend the best, most efficient, vegan, and earth-friendly ways to travel inexpensively (and stay healthy and safe) across the country.   

 

Food choices for vegans are quite often not choices at all, and one must be prepared and aware, especially on the road. This book will not only offer convenient tips and tricks for vegans, it will be a hands-on guide for anyone wanting to travel or visit state and national parks, landmarks, and cities throughout the U.S. It will include safety and time-saving tips, while focusing on our need to treasure the amazing natural beauty in our own back yards, and the importance of respecting the planet and all its splendor. 

 

I will be leaving my home in Orlando, FL late-May, and camping my way clockwise around the country, returning mid-July. Conservation and preserving nature are very important to me, and I assure you I will make every effort to minimize my environmental impact along the way, as well as do Two Hands Projects wherever and whenever possible. 

 

Al's Army/Navy Store has generously provided me with some very cool safety/survival items including a compact/lightweight all-weather blanket, a Columbia SPF 30 hiking shirt, a Guru multi-purpose tool, a lockable gun case, pepper spray, an extensive first-aid kit, a head lamp, insect repellent, and much more. Al's Army rocks! My waterproof Timberland hiking boots have been provided by Rack Room Shoes, and my backpack, bed roll, rain poncho, and sleeping bag were donated by Fox Hole Army/Navy Store. Emergen-C has kindly given me plenty of packets of Emergen-C BLUE to help me sustain good health and energy, and The Center for Biological Diversity has provided me with condoms to pass out along the way to help bring awareness about the many ecological problems caused by human overpopulation.

 

 

What's in it for YOU!

In order to make this book possible, I need help with travel expenses and incidentals. And trust me, I am one frugal and resourceful woman, I will make every dollar count! 

 

I would absolutely LOVE for you to join me on the trip! I will be posting daily updates including pics and video, so come on, let's do this thang!!!

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help me spread the word! This is gonna rock!!! Please use any of the convenient share tools provided above.
