We’re a group of outdoor enthusiasts and athletes with a passion for improving the gear we use every day. Our testing grounds are just out the back door in the high desert country of Central Oregon, where there’s no shortage of gear challenges.  We've been designing and developing hydration products for over 25 years and today Mazama offers a full line of hydration solutions including comfortable, lightweight packs, easy-fill reservoirs, and innovative accessories. Whether it’s a walk around the block or a wilderness adventure, our products are designed to make your day better.

story:
From today on, you no longer have to worry about losing your personal belongings
due to theft.

The Spinsafe securely protects your valuables at the lake, the open-air swimming pool,
while surfing or at the festival campsite.

The risk of having to apply for the involuntary replacement of your driver's licence,
ID card or bank cards is finally over!

You can even attach backpacks, shoes or dog leashes with an optionally available
steel cable lock on the Spinsafe.

Get your personal Spinsafe in your favorite color now!

 

Features

 

It's easy to use

 

Our App makes the Spinsafe even safer

While your smartphone is locked in, the app is detecting if someone is tampering with the Spinsafe and alerts you and people around by a high-pitched alarm sound. But there's even more! You can set up a notification directed at nearby friends and other Spinsafe users. In this way, they can help you to avert attempted theft. The larger the Spinsafe community, the higher the level of protection.

The Spinsafe is becoming safer and safer! If we succeed, we deliver continuous security updates not only to the app but we also offer physical security upgrades. The first one planned is a module that brings new protection features to you even without the locked in smartphone. This upgrade includes a feature that can alert certain smart watches and an independent shock sensor. You can simply click the modules into the Spinsafe without tools.

 

Check out what others think about the Spinsafe

check here (in German): Augsburger Allgemeine 1 | Augsburger Allgemeine 2 | Gifhorner Rundschau 1 | Gifhorner Rundschau 2 | Gifhorner Rundschau 3 | Gifhorner Rundschau 4 | Leipziger Volkszeitung | hitradio rt1 | Radio 7 | BR Fernsehen

 

High quality design manufactured in Germany  

After a newspaper article in the Augsburger Allgemeine Zeitung, a plastic injection molding company became aware of the Spinsafe. The producer has many years of experience in the production of supplier parts for the automotive industry but is also interested in the implementation of new and innovative product ideas. So, it comes that the Spinsafe is going to be manufactured in Bavaria, in the south of Germany. In order to protect the environment a high proportion of recycled material is used in production and packaging.

 

Who is working on this?

Gero Kraus | 26 | computer scientist and Dennis Zappi | 35 | industrial engineer have been working intensively on the Spinsafe idea since about two years. From March 2018, they have received a start-up scholarship from the Federal Ministry of Economics to drive development forward.

Dennis is scientifically engaged in the creation of innovative products within his part-time Master's program. His master thesis will be about the Spinsafe.

Gero is the IT specialist of the two-person gang. He has developed the theft protection app and is responsible for the technological development of the Spinsafe. He's the multi-purpose genius on the team.

"Our vision is that people can reconquer a great deal of independence and freedom during their recreational activities. If we can help you stop worrying about losing your valuables while swimming in the lake or open-air pool, then we have accomplished our mission."

 

Rewards

​Now you can help us to fulfill our mission and even benefit from it yourself. Thanks to your contribution, next summer you will be one of the first to hold the brand new Spinsafe in your hands. You'll receive a physically and digitally secured outdoor vault to protect your valuables and a large piece of independence during outdoor activities.

You can choose from four different colors: white, yellow, green and pink. For every Spinsafe you order, you'll get a gym bag on top. Also included is a 3-digit combination lock and of course our theft alert app which you can download on app store.

As the Spinsafe is still under development, the appearance of the series product may slightly differ from the photos shown here. But rest assured, it will still look amazing and, more importantly, it will reliably protect your valuables.

For further discounts or collective orders, please do not hesitate to contact us.
We will send you a special offer link! The same applies if you have specific questions about the Spinsafe.

 

Timeline

 

Product future & perspective of the Spinsafe

We will make sure that the mobile outdoor vault not only satisfies our but more importantly your safety requirements. Therefore, we are constantly improving its alert functions to make it more secure. But also, we will make the Spinsafe even more versatile through the possibility of upgrades.

For this purpose, we have designed its construction in a modular way right from the start. In the future, it will be possible to charge your mobile phone while it is in the safe via an integrated power bank. Users will also be able to convert the Spinsafe into a 360° loudspeaker or even into a storm proof dock for tents and pavilions without using any tools.

 

FAQs

First time on Indiegogo?

It's super easy! Please watch our video and have a good look at our campaign! Decide how many Spinsafes you would like to get for yourself and/or to give away. Then, select your perk and click on GET THIS PERK on the right side of the screen. Fill out your shipping address and payment information (credit/debit card only). Click on SUBMIT PAYMENT.

Please share our campaign to make the Spinsafe come reality! We will keep you updated and contact you when the campaign is over. If we are successful you'll get your Spinsafe in April 2019.

Does the Spinsafe do harm to the lawn?

Spinsafe leaves only a small hole, which can be closed by a couple footsteps. The lawn does not suffer any damage.

Do I get the Spinsafe in my desired color?

For reasons of sunlight absorption, the top shell of the Spinsafe is supplied in the light colors offered. This ensures that your valuables do not heat up unnecessarily in the sun. If you don't like your picked color later on, watch our offer and simply change the top shell individually.

Is the Spinsafe also suitable for sandy beaches?

The current screw is designed for the lawn. If we experience a positive market acceptance, we will offer an appropriately designed screw for sandy grounds. This size will offer more space for larger valuables and even have an integrated beach umbrella mount.

Is the Spinsafe waterproof?

The Spinsafe is splash water proof and keeps your mobile phone and valuables dry and protected from surprising rain showers.

Can't the Spinsafe be loosened by shaking so it can be pulled out of the ground?

As tests with non-optimized reference products showed we can't even shake the connection between screw and ground. Thieves try to act inconspicuous and prefer easy targets. But if they are really out for it our app comes into play and alerts you and people around by a loud acoustic signal.

How does the theft alert app work?

You can start the app when placing your mobile phone in the Spinsafe. It uses sensor data from the smartphone to detect violent force against the Spinsafe. When a potential theft attempt is detected a shrill alarm is triggered via your smartphone speakers.

I don't have a Credit Card.

Just drop us an E-Mail at info@spinsafe.de and we find a solution that works for you.

I have a question that isn't answered here.

If you have any questions for us or just want to say hi, just drop us an Email at info@spinsafe.de

The Spinsafe project is funded by the Federal Ministry of Economics and Energy and the European Social Fund as part of the EXIST program.

Das Projekt Spinsafe wird im Rahmen des EXIST-Programms durch das Bundesministerium für Wirtschaft und Energie und den Europäischen Sozialfonds gefördert.

story:
UNSTOPPABLE TRAVEL BAGS 

 

DRIFT AND ROLL CONTROL 

The unique wheels give the ability for travel in any direction and over almost any surface. Never again will wrestle with your wheeled bag to get it moving in the direction you want to go. Never agin will you have to lift your bag over elevator door runners, cobbles, gravel or other obstacles. 

 

Unstoppable bags are made from thick padded ballistic nylon.  With the optional foam infill they are easily become camera and kit bags for your gadgets. 

WHEELCHAIR COMPATIBLE 

We are committed to diversity, Unstoppable bags can be fitted with the optional wheelchair adapter at no extra cost.  Make sure  you select the wheelchair option when ordering. 

 

 

 

THE FULL SET 

Why not treat yourself to the full set of Unstoppable luggage? Full set consists of the 41L UNSTOPPABLE Compact Carry-On and the 87L Unstoppable gear bag that includes a matching and connecting31L  backpack. The Full set also comes with a wheelchair compatible option and foam infills for each bag plus waterproofing spray.

 

 

DELIVERY TIMELINE

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Angelica. I am 17 years old and I was born in Colombia. I currently live in Miami, fl and I attend Calvary Chapel Christian church. This mission trip is my first one ever so I am super excited. I will be going with 11 members of my youth gorup and church. This project is really important to me because I believe it's an experience that will help me grow spiritually because I will be stepping out of my comfort zone and I will be going to another country for a whole week, to serve others in need. I will really appreaciate any monetary donation, it will not only benefit me, but people in Costa Rica who are yet to hear the good news of Jesus Christ and also you will be blessed. 

What We Need & What You Get

I will neeed 1,000 dollars to go to this mission trip. This money will help me pay for all meals, airlines fares, transportation and housing, airport exit tax. 

As a group we will be staying in Heredia, Costa Rica at the house of Juan Carlos Sanchez, who is the leader of the missioanry ministry "Cave of Adullam". We will be doing all kinds of activities to serve the community! For example, bullding houses and churches, painting, doing any house job. In addition, we are preparing skits with christian messages for audiences of all ages especially children!! so that they can have a good time and remember the lesson. Also, we will be visiting the poor homes of many Costa Ricans and we will be sharing the word of God, and his LOVE!!!! 

If I do not reach my goal I will donate this money to the Cave of Adullam missionary ministry in Costa Rica. 

The Impact

I believe this project is very valuable because we will not only help people building their homes, or giving them physical food, but also giving them spiritual food. We will be bringing them joy, love and hope. I know these people will be grateful when they find out that there is somebody that really cares for them. I only know that the Great Commision Jesus gave us in Mattew 28:19 is not an option, is a commandment and I have decided to obey Him. The main goal of this mission is to evangelize and show people that they are not alone but that they have an all powerful God who is able to make possible the impossible, and that He is SO for us because He loves us! During this mission trip we expect to see many miracles and changed lives by the power of the holy spirit and the love of God. We will be casting crowns for his kingdom!!

 (Matthew 28:19) "Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit" 

 

Other Ways You Can Help Me

-Keep us in prayers in your church and families!

-Share this site with all your friends and acquaintances!

-Pray for God's will to be done!

THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME, AND SUPPORT! :)God bless you

During this mission trip we expect to see many miracles and changed lives by the power of the holy spirit and the love of God. We will be casting crowns for his kingdom!!
 (Matthew 28:19) "Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit" 
 
Other Ways You Can Help Me
-Keep us in prayers in your church and families!
-Share this site with all your friends and acquaintances!
-Pray for God's will to be done!


THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME, AND SUPPORT! :)God bless you

story:
New GREEN EDC Organizer option!

At the end of this project when we are ready to ship your rewards, we will be using the post-campaign pledge management system BackerKit. You will have the option at that time to tell us which color you want for your EDC Organizer(s). Choose between Black, Gray, Brown, or Green! You will also be able to purchase ADD-ONS to ship together with your pledge reward (e.g. additional EDC Organizers, First Aid Survival Kits, and other ZEROHOUR products) We will be sending out a backer update with BackerKit instructions and invitations when we are ready to move into the shipping phase.

$150,000 Stretch Goal... UNLOCKED!

There are now three color options for the EDC Organizer and Detachable Center Pouch. You will be able to choose from black, brown/khaki, or gray!

$75,000 Stretch Goal... UNLOCKED!

Each EDC Organizer will now come with a detachable center pouch that will serve two purposes; separate both sides of the organizer to protect items from touching/scratching each other AND provide a mesh slot + zippered pocket to store even more stuff!

During our search for an organizer to carry our own EDC products, we've learned that there are a lot of great organizers out there. However, there were two problems we encountered:

1) There wasn't an organizer small enough to carry a lighter load that also gave us the ability to expand to carry larger items when we needed to.

2) We found that a lot of organizers featured similar, limited strap configurations on both sides of their inner compartments. We wanted more strap versatility.

This is what led us to design our own.

Whether you’re a daily commuter, emergency responder, avid traveler, or work-from-home EDC enthusiast staying organized is important to be truly prepared for anything; especially when it comes to keeping those small or large every day carry items close at hand.

Compression & Expansion Zipper 

EDC organizers come in various sizes and capacities but ours is one size with dual capacity. So what we did was we took the expansion zipper feature from our ZIP Travel Waist Pack project 3 years ago, and put it into the organizer...

 

This extra zipper is designed solely for expanding or collapsing the overall depth of the bag to give you more or less space for storing items. This helps you add larger things such as bandages and medicine bottles, or to save space when you’re traveling or packing light.

GRID-STYLE STRAPS

Elastic grid-style straps isn't new to the storage industry, however to the best of our knowledge, they have never been used inside of a zippered EDC organizer until now...

Our multipurpose EDC organizer provides you with plenty of storage straps for storing and securing all the little things you’ll need to provide emergency repairs, keep your tech device cables organized, or simply be better prepared for any camping or survival activities.

Rugged Materials

We know that you might use this all-purpose EDC carry bag for some pretty serious outdoor or emergency response needs which is why it has high tear and puncture resistance and designed with reinforced zippers and pulls.

 

Multiple Carry Options

We’ve added a small handle at the top of the bag for some quick grab-and-go use as well as two long MOLLE compatible snaps that let you attach it to larger backpack or bag so you don’t misplace it or leave it behind. 

Morale Patches

On the outside of our rugged EDC organizer pouch you’ll find a Velcro (hook & loop) patch area that will let you attach one of your favorite patches such as a country flag, military unit, military branch, red cross, or a patch from the best TV show ever!

*Patch not included. You can find this patch and many others on eBay, Amazon, Google search, etc.

Water-Resistant Fabric

Made with water-resistant 500D fabric to help keep your gear drier on the inside when you’re traveling, working outside, or stuck working in a bit of inclement weather like rain or snow.

Please Note: The organizer is NOT waterproof and does not float on water.

YKK Zippers and Pulls

Each EDC organizer features thick pulls attached to the zipper base with reinforced silicone wrapped around them for added strength and pull resilience.

VERSATILITY

Our organizer allows a wider range of emergency response or outdoor travel gear while also adding a sleek, trendy look that matches its toughness. 

We went through several different design options. Here are the most recent illustrations showing the first and second styles which ultimately led to the final design.

*Please note that you are pledging on the EDC Organizer ONLY. Every-day carry items (e.g. Apple AirPods, pocket knives, flashlights, tools, velcro patches, etc.) that are shown in the photos, videos, and animations are for educational purposes only. 

After the campaign, all backers will provide shipping information and confirm pledge rewards through BackerKit, where we will offer the opportunity to purchase additional EDC Organizers, ZEROHOUR products, and other accessories (ADD-ONS) to ship together with your reward. Instructions will be provided at the end of the campaign in a backer update.

First Aid Survival Kit

We understand that putting together a First Aid Survival Kit by purchasing items one-by-one yourself can be tedious. So to make things easier, we've teamed up with a manufacturing partner and put together an awesome package for you. The First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON will include the following items:

25 products totaling 240 pieces will make setting up your organizer a breeze. Available as a BackerKit ADD-ON for just $25 more! 

International Backers:

Please check with your country's knife import laws before purchasing the First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON. The knife specifications are as follows: It is a folding knife that has a flipper tab for one-hand operation, there is a liner-lock that keeps the blade locked when opened, and the blade's total length is 3.25 inches / 8.25 cm.

In the event that the knife is not allowed in your country, you will have the option to purchase the ADD-ON without the pocket knife.

Bonus:

We are also including a RED CROSS patch for your EDC Organizer if you purchase the First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON. The patch by itself will also be available as an ADD-ON.

For USA backers; single organizer rewards we will ship via USPS First Class Mail (5-7 Business Days), two or more organizers will typically ship via USPS Priority Mail (2-3 Business Days). For international backers; we are going to be using USPS ePacket which varies between 10 - 21 Business Days. As of July 1st, 2020 ePacket is ONLY available in these countries:

If your country is not listed above, you can still pledge but we HIGHLY recommend that you consider upgrading to FedEx Priority Mail (3 to 5 Business Days; Guaranteed Service) otherwise your package may be at risk for getting lost/stolen. FedEx will be available as an ADD-ON on BackerKit at the end of the campaign. 

With the support of our backers, we've raised over $1,000,000 to create ZEROHOUR products, which have been featured on The Today Show, CNet, Yahoo! Tech, and Discovery Science Channel. Backers, media, and consumers support us because we know how to reinvent products, and we stand by our work with limited lifetime warranties.

Thank you for your support as we welcome the EDC Organizer to the ZEROHOUR family!

story:
How do you take a duffel bag that's already awesome … and make it even awesomer?

After the Taskin Kube became such a global sensation with backers and customers in more than 60 nations, we spent months reviewing every piece of feedback we received on how to make this amazing duffel even more so. We evaluated the feasibility of each and every suggested enhancement, and we've implemented dozens of the biggest, brightest ideas from our loyal backers. And now, we're incredibly proud to present to you: The All-New Taskin Kube 2.

At home in the office, the airport, the gym and even the boardroom, the Taskin Kube delivers cool, confident style and functionality that’ll have you turning heads everywhere you go. No duffel does it better.

 

REINFORCED EVERYTHING

One of the best pieces of feedback we received? Make it Taskin tough. So we added riveted shoulder strap anchors, double-stitched straps and a new, high-density form. These enhancements not only make the Kube a lot more rugged, but it improves on its widely-praised aesthetics.

LAPTOP SLEEVE 

Another request was for a laptop sleeve, so folks don't have to have two daily bags when they're on the move. Your wish is our Shift-Command-N. The Kube 2 comes with a padded laptop sleeve on the inside. The size of the sleeve is 40 x 22 cms for the original sized and 40 x 27 cms for the Voyager.

MAGNETIC HANDLE WRAPS

This was a feature we wanted to add to the original Kube, and have been iterating on the design to meet our exacting standards. We love it, and you'll no doubt love it, too.

HANDLES ON BOTH ENDS 

Easy-grab handles on both ends of the bag make the Kube 2 easy to pull from the overhead bin. Being able to hold the handle also makes the action to pull close the double zipper twice as easy. 

NEW LARGER VOYAGER EDITION 

The Kube 2 comes in 2 sizes. See how we did that? Clever. Now, there's the Kube Original size for your daily adventures and short trips. And, there's also the Kube Voyager Edition for longer trips or when you're traveling with your entire posse. The new Voyager Edition easily accommodates 6 Large Taskin Duplex packing cubes. 

AND A LOT MORE... 

Double bottle holders, an upgraded divider, easy-pull zippers and many small enhancements that make a big difference inside and out to ensure the Kube 2 is ready to help you conquer the world like no other travel duffel around. 

Building on the success of its predecessor, the Kube 2's distinctive design is perfect for anyone who appreciates clean lines and uncommon quality that convey both style and substance. And with two great sizes, it's the one bag you need to carpe more diem—and look great while you do it. 

DOUBLE-WIDE ACCESS 

Know that single, narrow opening you get with other duffels? Been there, hated that. With Kube 2, just pull one of the Easy-Grab Handles to easily access the entire compartment. It's no wonder all the other duffels are so jealous. 

 EASY COME, EASY GO ERGONOMICS

Extra-padded, double-stitch straps with riveted four-point anchors make carrying the Kube 2 a breeze, no matter which shoulder you prefer—no flopping from side-to-side. We've innovated the handle system, too. Forget the Velcro straps you get with so many other duffels (seriously, lame). Our new handle wraps attach magnetically for instant comfort and a satisfying "whoosh" feel.

VENTED SHOE CUBBY

Maybe it's snazzy running shoes. Stately Oxfords. Sensible Flats. Or those steel toe boots you got in Telluride. When it comes to a change of kicks, the Kube 2 has you covered. Our vented shoe compartment opens in the back, and is specially lined so the rest of your belongings stay clean.

SLIDE & RIDE TRAVEL TRIGGER  

Headed to New York? Paris? Bangkok or Dubai? Slide the Kube 2 onto your suitcase handle and you're ready to jet in style. 

TASKIN KOMPAK DUPLEX - PACKING CUBE

Pack like a pro. Keep everything organized and your clothes wrinkle-free. The Taskin Duplex offers dual-side compression so you can pack more into the same space. The Taskin Duplex is the last word in packing cubes. 

BONUS: The Taskin Edge Backpack

We know, right? If you don’t already have this amazing backpack to call your own, it means you missed out on the Taskin Edge's Kickstarter campaign. But don’t freak. Here’s your chance to get in on the world’s best-designed business backpack:

Pledge at the "Kube 2 Original Size + Edge Backpack" tier and be rewarded with the Taskin Edge Backpack.

We know, right? If you don’t already have this amazing backpack to call your own, it means you missed out on the Taskin Edge's Kickstarter campaign. But don’t freak. Here’s your chance to get in on the world’s best-designed business backpack:
Pledge at the "Kube 2 Original Size + Edge Backpack" tier and be rewarded with the Taskin Edge Backpack.

story:
Musicians, your travel experience is about to be revolutionized! Forget about lugging heavy and awkward cases, or putting your precious instrument at risk with soft bags. The Kapsule is a sleek, wearable, rollable, and tech-loaded "all-in-one" musician's luggage!

Why did we design the Kapsule?

  • Soft gig bags, while comfortable, don’t offer enough protection to check in.
  • Hard cases are good for checking in, but they’re a pain to lug around, they’re heavy and definitely not designed to be worn comfortably, if at all.
  • Both typically have very limited storage, and you almost always have to bring a 2nd roller or duffle bag for your clothes and toiletries.

So we took the benefits of all these and fused them together into one amazing bag that not only holds your guitar and accessories, but also packs your clothes enough for a 2- to 3-day trip!
 


// Protect Your Axe

Trust your instrument to be well-protected in the Kapsule's tough polycarbonate shell. A thick layer of lightweight expanded polystyrene made of 98% air has excellent shock absorbency and insulation to keep your guitar or bass safe. The front of the Kapsule has a massive storage area of any gig bag for your tour-essential gear.


// Consolidate Your Luggage

You may also use that space to pack your clothes and leave your roller luggage at home. With 17+ liters of cargo space, there's enough room for a 2- to 3-day trip. Add our compression packing cubes (stretch goal #2) and you can fit nearly double!


 

​// Save Your Back With Wheels

Our snap-on wheels will make longer walks a breeze, and attaches in seconds without any tools.


 

​// Prevent Headstock Damage

The Kapsule's unique Iso Chamber minimizes the risk of headstock damage by keeping it suspended and isolated.


// Practice Anywhere

Want the freedom to practice anywhere, anytime? Our optional PLAY package is powered by our micro headphone amp small enough to fit in your hand! Simply plug in your headphones and audio player to practice privately. Enjoy dynamic hi-fidelity sound from the nearly-weightless amp, designed by world-renowned audiophile engineer Phil Jones. A 10-foot instrument cable and a 3.5mm auxiliary cable are also included.


// Keep It Charged

Staying productive on the go is easier with your devices charged! Our POWER package features our Oktane wireless power bank (10,000mAh) and two Oktane charging cables (one 6-inch and one 4-foot) with your choice of Apple Lightning or Micro USB. 


// 1 Year Free Peace Of Mind

We’re introducing our industry-first Global Recovery Tag (powered by HomingPIN) for peace of mind while you travel, integrated in over 2800 airports. When a baggage handler finds your bag, they simply type in your unique tag number into their lost-and-found system and you’ll receive a text message and email. A fellow travel can also simply scan the QR code, enter the tag number, and you'll be notified immediately. Service is free for one year upon activation.

Using the anonymous tag number instead of a traditional luggage tag will also help protect your identity while you travel. 


// Find Your Kapsule By Voice

As our first stretch goal we’re enabling our voice-controlled Bluetooth Tracker (via Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, or Apple's Siri) as an add-on option for your Kapsule, complete with an iOS or Android app (powered by Chipolo). The tracker will not only help you find your Kapsule, but also lets you see its last location if it's out of range. 



 


// Fight Humidity Damage

Avoid costly repairs of hairline cracks and warping due to humidity changes. We teamed up with Boveda to include two-way humidity control, a must-have for any guitar or bass. Place the humidity packs in the built-in pockets to maintain the optimal level of humidity for your instrument. Your Kapsule will come pre-packaged with a FREE Boveda humidity pack and pouch.

​
// Lock Down Your Guitar

Finally, your Kapsule comes with an industry-standard TSA lock to secure your instrument. Set your 3-digit code and only authorized airport security will be able to open your bag.


 

 

 



// First Impressions

 

Meet the Team

We're a passionate bunch over at Gruv Gear, and we've been creating truly innovative and ground-breaking products since our start in 2010—Nearly every product we've launched is patented or patent pending! We strive to build fresh new inventions that make life easier, whether it's for musicians, photographers, filmmakers, or the avid jetsetter. 

We're blessed to have our brand and products distributed in over 55 countries to date, and we ship worldwide from our warehouses in California, Shanghai, Germany, and Canada.


Left to right: Jay, Janeth, Jason, Prince, Victoria, Jeff, and Peter.


Project Challenges

We've prepared well for this project and have most of the design done, materials selected, and 3D specs ready to go. One of the main challenges we're facing is the uncertainty of costs with our factories due to recent import tax negotiations between USA and China, and ensuring we lock down reasonable costs to support our planned retail pricing. Another challenge is the required funds and efforts to produce multiple size Kapsules, as minimum order quantities have also been rising. If we don't reach certain stretch goals, however, we still aim to build all models but with a staggered timeline. 

Your contribution and help to spread the word to other musicians will all help to create momentum and success for the Kapsule project, so please share our photos and videos on social media and through word-of-mouth so together we can help revolutionize travel!

Welcome to the Indiegogo for Stapleton Camping 2018. As many of you know, there is an annual Stapleton Camping trip, open to all who have participated in past Stapleton Theatre/Town Player shows, plus friends and family.

Indiegogo? Crowdfunding? What does this mean? Take a look at the Frequently Asked Questions:

Why crowdfunding?

  • In the past, one or two people have been responsible for funding and then collecting for the full cost of camping. This is a way to spread the cost and responsibility among a larger group.

Where and when is the trip?

  • The Richardson Grove Group Camp is the camp of choice.
  • The trip will be in summer, 2018. The exact dates will be determined by a poll of those who contribute to the Indiegogo.

What happens when the date arrives?

  • There is no charge for camping. You arrive, and you pick a spot in the group site.
  • Everyone is welcome to come, whether they contribute to the Indiegogo or not.
  • There may be additional shared costs, such as group meals, firewood, etc., but the cost of the campsite has been covered.

How much should I contribute?

  • The suggested contribution is $25/person, but you should contribute exactly what you wish to give.

What if the Indiegogo does not raise the minimum needed for the campsite?

  • You will not be charged.
  • Camping 2018 will go to Plan B - whatever that may be - but it won’t be the Richardson Grove Group Camp.

Does my contribution guarantee a camping spot?

  • Yes! While we hope to accommodate everyone who wishes to come, the campground has a capacity of around 40 people. If you contribute, you are guaranteed a space.

What if I contribute to the Indiegogo, but can’t or choose not to make the trip?

  • You have helped make Stapleton Camping 2018 a success!
  • You have helped others who possibly could not afford to attend the trip.
  • You have helped build the community.
  • In short, you have “paid it forward.”

Please consider contributing. Contact Bob Kadoyama, if you have any questions. We hope to see you at Richardson Grove!
story_txt:
Welcome to the Indiegogo for Stapleton Camping 2018. As many of you know, there is an annual Stapleton Camping trip, open to all who have participated in past Stapleton Theatre/Town Player shows, plus friends and family.
Indiegogo? Crowdfunding? What does this mean? Take a look at the Frequently Asked Questions:
Why crowdfunding?
In the past, one or two people have been responsible for funding and then collecting for the full cost of camping. This is a way to spread the cost and responsibility among a larger group.
Where and when is the trip?

The Richardson Grove Group Camp is the camp of choice.
The trip will be in summer, 2018. The exact dates will be determined by a poll of those who contribute to the Indiegogo.

What happens when the date arrives?

There is no charge for camping. You arrive, and you pick a spot in the group site.
Everyone is welcome to come, whether they contribute to the Indiegogo or not.
There may be additional shared costs, such as group meals, firewood, etc., but the cost of the campsite has been covered.

How much should I contribute?
The suggested contribution is $25/person, but you should contribute exactly what you wish to give.
What if the Indiegogo does not raise the minimum needed for the campsite?

You will not be charged.
Camping 2018 will go to Plan B - whatever that may be - but it won’t be the Richardson Grove Group Camp.

Does my contribution guarantee a camping spot?
Yes! While we hope to accommodate everyone who wishes to come, the campground has a capacity of around 40 people. If you contribute, you are guaranteed a space.
What if I contribute to the Indiegogo, but can’t or choose not to make the trip?

You have helped make Stapleton Camping 2018 a success!
You have helped others who possibly could not afford to attend the trip.
You have helped build the community.
In short, you have “paid it forward.”

Please consider contributing. Contact Bob Kadoyama, if you have any questions. We hope to see you at Richardson Grove!

story:
(NOTE:  All Campaigns Need to End at Some Point, but Check Out Our Newest Updated One at igg.me/at/P-CRaFT-Science)

Short Summary

Walter Wood and his small band of engineers have revived a long neglected equation of force for gyroscopic action, and adapted it into an exciting patented new science, that we call Revolving Flywheel Reactive Propulsion (RFRP).  Without wings, without rockets or propellers, without a real need for aerodynamics, this will soon give birth to a whole new class of efficient and relatively simple vehicles for travel on land, sea, air, or into outer space!  The problem?  Well, none of the Wizards of Smart will take this new knowledge seriously enough to evaluate it on the merits - YET. 

So, we are going to have to do what the Wright Brothers did early in the last century.  That is, we need to build a few of these with some fairly common parts, and then go fly them around the heads of those who say it isn't possible.  

We will show you how the force equation has been developed, and give you videos of crude models that we have and are building on our own to demonstrate the powered motion.  What we need in this campaign is your help to get the resources to build the world's FIRST Go Anywhere Flying RFRP Vehicle, and then take it around and demonstrate for the public.  Our vision is something like the DeLorean in the 1980's motion picture, Back to the Future (except without the time travel part).

If you would have helped the Wright Brothers in their time, then you will want to help us with this!  It is going to happen at some point, but with your help it can happen This Year (2014)!

What We Need & What You Get

We mostly need assistance for obtaining high quality parts and supplies to make experimental models, and to protect the patent rights to the new science of RFRP.  Then we plan to make a few versions of the best models, and take them around the country for public demonstrations.  One of the models will be large and powerful enough for at least one person to drive/fly around, something like Alladin's flying carpet.

Wouldn't you like to explore the new science with us, perhaps provide input and suggestions along the way that may be recorded in your name for posterity, or even receive the exclusive rights to build one for your very own use, according to formulas and plans that we will provide for guidance? 

Whether we come close to achieving our funding goal, or surpass it, there is much to do, and we will use whatever resources wisely, to further the development, with as many spinoffs as we can all collectively imagine.

The Impact


Would you like to use a breakthrough RFRP unit to fly conveniently around your own house, hover quietly in the air, help you dive to the bottom of the sea, or even venture out into empty space? Well, it really isn't so far-fetched, at least not any more.

We have patented the new concept for powered drive in three dimensions, utilizing the reaction forces generated by spinning gyroscopes (flywheels, if you will). We have recently succeeded in building a demonstration/test model that utilizes a single pair of gyro flywheels. The world has not seen anything like it before, outside of what is recorded in the Book of Ezekiel. In fact, we often refer to it as the Ezekiel Project.

This unit moves on a smooth surface, utilizing ¾ hp and ½ hp motors. It weighs approximately 230 pounds, and the main pair of drive gyros rotate between 1000 and 1500 RPM.

The first video we chose for illustration above is a level, forward run, recorded on June 18, 2013

The second video is a backup, recorded on July 12, 2013. The change in direction of the unit was achieved by simple rotation in the opposite direction from the first.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vqqeh0_vN5k

The third video is a ramp run, going forward and up at a very modest 0.8% grade. This was recorded on July 13, 2013.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6uR0MvoNxw

Yes, we noticed that the motion is very awkward, that it was limited by the length of the power cords, and the purpose at that point was not yet an attempt to fly or raise and hover. We have also seen some of the strange but similar experiments posted by others at sites, such as YouTube.  Don't worry about those, because we have the patent and we are the ones who have figured out a way to get nearly as much power out of the unit as we put in!

Our project now is to use what we learned, and with some help, design, build and test a new model that will move in all dimensions, hover, and stay under control while the gyros are powered. We propose to do this by changing the power to weight ratio, adding some reorientation and stabilizing measures, and power it primarily by means of a gas engine.


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KkWF9PcJTyI 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X1CC-Lrj0V4
The result will be the first of its kind type of powered vehicle, like what was conceived in the science fiction series Star Trek, and others. Their engineer, Montgomery Scott, referred (or perhaps will refer) to it as "impulse powered drive", with less than light speed capability.


Other Ways You Can Help

Here is an example of a correspondence we just received from the aerospace division of the once great General Electric Corporation.  So Typical!

RE:  Your Online Submission

  Title:Revolving Flywheels Reactive Flight Proposal 

Dear Mr. Cor:

We write in response to the above referenced Submitted Idea, which you submitted to GE on November 4, 2013.

We regret to report that after careful consideration, our people in GE Aviation have reported that they have no interest in adopting or using your idea.

That being the case, we have no basis to pay any compensation or to award an honorarium. However, we wish to thank you for having given our people the opportunity to consider this matter.

Very truly yours,

 

Submitted Ideas

 

General Electric Company

GE Imagination at work

Imagination at work?!  Well, You be the judge, but here is a way you can help us to get this observed by the general public - by just telling as many people as you can about the RFRP science.  For now, some of them may laugh, as many laughed at other pioneers.

It is a worthy subject for discussion, at least, don't you think?  And be sure to use the great tools of Indiegogo to spread the word!  Be among the first to join us in something truly great!

story:
Our packs come in two sizes and in six beautiful designs.


NOTE: Our campaign is in Australian Dollars, you will need to convert to your local currency!

Any questions, don't hesitate to email us on info@elephantstripes.com.au

Francesca and Jordan

All packs are made with high quality, water-resistant, 1000D Polyester material and strong YKK zips and buckles.

The interior of the bags have useful pockets, compression straps and fun liners! The Rainforest and the Geometric Explorer have plain black liners to make them more attractive to both men and women. 

The only difference in the features between the two sizes of bags is that the 65L pack comes with a zip on daypack, and has a lightweight frame to give it some structure. 

GET THE FULL PACKAGE!

At Elephant Stripes we do more than just travel packs! In the full package you'll almost get one of every product we have created, which will prepare you for any adventure. Where relevant you will be able to choose your preferred colour or design.

In your package you will get: [click on the links to see more pictures and info] 

  • Either a 45L or 65L Travel Pack
    • A folding daypack
    • A 3 Pack of Packing Cells
    • A multi purpose pouch
    • A cosmetic case
    • A Turkish travel wrap
    • A hanging toiletry bag
    • AND an eye mask!

These items can also be bought individually from our website - click on the links to see more. If you would like to purchase anything to be sent with your travel pack tick 'Pick Up' when you get to checkout and you will not be charged again for shipping. Just put a note in the Additional Instructions that you are an Indiegogo backer :)

As avid travel lovers, our lives revolve around all things travel. We have spent years searching high and low for exciting gear for our adventures, but to no avail. Over and over again we had to choose between travel gear that looked good OR was durable and functional. We aired our frustrations with friends and found they shared our want of better travel products.  We noticed most packs were made for the primary purpose of hiking, not travelling. The result was ugly, top-loading bags, with straps hanging off everywhere that were less than ideal for travelling. 

We thought “Surely travel products could be stylish, without compromising on functionality?... maybe we were going to have to be the ones to do it”

Thus the idea for Elephant Stripes began to grow…Two years, a fair bit of travel, many crazy moments and late nights later, Elephant Stripes has arrived with the perfect travel packs for stylish globe-trotters!!

The Bag for Bag donations programme is one of our favourite initiatives at Elephant Stripes. For every Travel Pack bought during this Kickstarter campaign we will give a school bag to an Indonesian child in need. 

We've partnered with The Bali Children's Project; a wonderful not-for profit charity registered in both the United States and Indonesia. The Bali Children's Project sponsors Indonesian children to continue education where they would not otherwise be able to for financial reasons. It is based on the idea that if children are empowered with education, they are more likely to live a fulfilled life. The families they sponsor barely have money for food, let alone school supplies. The donated school bags will be a huge help for the families and something to treasure for the children!

At Elephant Stripes we believe in always doing the right thing. For us that means implementing better business practices where possible, and always striving to do better by people and planet. 

We custom design and print all our fabrics. Both sizes come in the following six designs:


The packs come in two sizes - the 45 Litre pack which is carry-on size for the majority of airlines and the 65 Litre pack which comes with a 15L zip-on daypack (80L total)

Elephant Stripes started with two girls from New Zealand who love to travel. We were both lucky enough to grow up in the beautiful North Island of New Zealand, but always had a curiosity to explore what lay beyond our small country on the edge of the world. After meeting on our first day of university when we found out we were roommates, we quickly bonded over a passion for travel. Since then we’ve travelled extensively both together and separately to over 20 countries. The joy of traveling, the people you meet, the places you see and the experiences you have is simply unbeatable in our opinion and it seems once bitten by the travel bug you’ve got it for life! 

Francesca is the logistics and legal mind of the company. Using her background in law and her practical nature she keeps things on track and steers the ship. 

Jordan is the creative genius behind Elephant Stripes. Charismatic and full of ideas, this hippy at heart brings all the pieces together and keeps the brand inspiring!

Since then we’ve travelled extensively both together and separately to over 20 countries. The joy of traveling, the people you meet, the places you see and the experiences you have is simply unbeatable in our opinion and it seems once bitten by the travel bug you’ve got it for life! 
Francesca is the logistics and legal mind of the company. Using her background in law and her practical nature she keeps things on track and steers the ship.

story: This is my 17th year jumping into Goodyear Lake for a good cause.  All funds raised help local children with serious health issues.  Please help me to reach my goal of $1500 and the events goal of $100,000.  For more information on the recipients and the event please go to pbjump.com.

story:
Demo video of the latest pre-production sample. The world's most sophisticated will soon be shipping!

 

 

Imagine a backpack that can wirelessly recharge its built-in battery pack when you're home and charges your gear when you're on the go, one that gently alerts you if you accidentally leave it open while walking around, locks all key zippers at the push of a single button, keeps your info secure with RFID-shielded pockets, even acts as your camera mount when you want to take a picture; and, looks sleek and beautiful in your choice of great colors and so many thoughtful features. 

Now stop imagining it — and help us bring Barracuda Konzu to market and be one of the first to get this state-of-the-art backpack an an unbelievable price.

From the creators of the ground breaking Barracuda Carry-on that raised 1.7 million in Crowdfunding - Konzu: The World's Most Advanced Backpack. 

 

 

These days, you’d expect any smart backpack to come with a built-in battery pack, and Barracuda Konzu is no exception. What’s revolutionary is that ours can be wirelessly charged. Simply place Konzu on its patent-pending wireless charging stand, and top up Konzu's 10,000 mAh battery pack — without meddling with messy wires. You can even leave your tablet or phone inside the bag plugged into Konzu's internal USB port to charge it along with the battery pack.   

All three version of the charging station will charge Konzu's built-in 10,000 mAh battery fully in 8 - 10 hours. Leaving your tablet or phone plugged in inside Konzu could increase the time by 2 - 4 hours depending on the battery capacity of the device left inside. 

The Premium Wood-Dual Charging station will, in addition, be equipped with a transmitter on its left shelf that can charge a Qi compatible device (or one with a Qi compatible case) in 8 - 10 hours.

One Standard Wireless Charging Station will ship with every Konzu. 

To upgrade that to a Premium Brushed Aluminum/Wood stand add $39/$49 to your contribution for each Konzu in your reward you wish to upgrade. 

If you need more than one charging station (home/office) add $19/$49/$59 to your contribution depending on the model as shown in the table above for each additional charging station.

The battery pack is removable & interchangeable. It can be charged directly via USB like other battery packs. Carrying Konzu with its battery pack into an airplane would be no different from carrying an ordinary battery pack.

 * Patents Pending

 

Barracuda Konzu’s revolutionary Push-2-Lock system is the ultimate solution to pickpockets. Without compromising on usability with awkward hidden zippers or having to individually lock each zipper — Konzu's 4 external zippers (2 main and 2 pockets) can be secured with the push of a single button on the strap. 

The lock can be engaged with zipper pullers in any position with no power source required. Pressing down/up the lock will instantly lock/unlock the zippers in any position. It only seems like magic.

* Patents Pending

 

Ever find you’ve been walking with an open bag, just ripe for pickpocketing? Barracuda Konzu takes smart to a whole new level with integrated sensors that detect and alert you if you walk off with your bag open. Along with our Push-2-Lock system, this provides two-factor protection when you’re on the move.   

* Patents Pending

 

The camera mount monopod attaches securely to an adaptor affixed to the bottom of the backpack, making it very stable. In addition to taking a selfie or a group (a “groupie”?) you can attach a GoPro and capture all the action on a hike or bike ride with ease.  

The camera mount includes: A telescoping adjustable stand, attachments for phone/camera (like GoPro), adaptor affixed to the backpack into which the stand docks and a bluetooth clicker that works with Android and iOS.

To get this camera mount accessory add $29 to your pledge.

* Patents Pending

 

Open every door in style—without ever misplacing your keys again. A perfectly located key pocket and heavy-duty retractable cord. This will also work well with scan cards and key fobs to get in and out of secured doors.

* Patents Pending

 

Need a place to stash that windbreaker or bike helmet, and there’s no more room in the backpack? No worries. Our expandable strap system gives you the extra little bit of storage you need to get your go on, in style.

 

That’s right. Hit the security line without having to dig out your laptop and throw it in a tray. Just unzip the TSA-approved laptop sleeve and your Konzu conquers the conveyor belt with everything intact and ready to zip up and go.

This section has two pockets, on the left for the laptop and the right for a tablet. The laptop pocket can fit a laptop up 17" in size.

 

 

Skimmers can scram. The Konzu’s RFID-shielded pockets keep your personal data safe and secure. No breach at the beach. No treachery on the morning train.

 

Who says you have to sacrifice style for comfort? Not Konzu, which comes with padding that makes even the heaviest of backpack loads a breeze. Konzu's pads are also designed to maximize airflow to keep your back cool and comfortable. You’ll wish everything in life came with padding like this.

 

The backpack can easily be attached to the handle of a carry-on —especially if you have a Barracuda carry-on.

 

"Everything is designed. Few things are designed well. – Brian Reed."

 

 

 

 

Advanced water resistant lightweight fabric and covered zippers keep the inside dry.

We didn't just want to design another backpack or just throw in a battery pack and call it smart. We set out to design THE backpack, a backpack like no other and we think we have succeeded. Now help us get it to market and get yourself this most amazing backpack at an equally amazing price.

 

The Barracuda Carry-on is smart collapsible carry-on that backers like you helped bring to market. The carry-on is packed with cutting edge features like a built-in laptop tray and ergonomic handle. Learn more at https://barracuda.co/. Travel in style like never before.

 

 

Some might correctly point out that we had published a timeline like this for our last campaign and we were delayed by over 10 months in shipping out the rewards. We have come a long way since then. The company was a garage startup started by silicon valley software engineers with little experience in the complexities of manufacturing and shipping real world products. But now having manufactured and shipped thousands of products across the world we are far more capable of staying on schedule. This is not to say that we might not run into technical difficulties developing this fairly complex and cutting edge product. We are confident in our abilities to deal with delays and minimize their impact.

As you may notice, the current prototypes featured in this campaign are already of high quality developed in partnership with a top manufacturer, a far cry from the garage made prototype of our previous campaign.

 

We are Barracuda. We have a passion for creating products that push the outer edge of imagination. We design products that blend cutting edge technology with innovative design. We strive to create products that make its peers obsolete. Help us bring Konzu: The World's Most Advanced Backpack to market.

Leaving your tablet or phone plugged in inside Konzu could increase the time by 2 - 4 hours depending on the battery capacity of the device left inside. The Premium Wood-Dual Charging station will, in addition, be equipped with a transmitter on its left shelf that can charge a Qi compatible device (or one with a Qi compatible case) in 8 - 10 hours.One Standard Wireless Charging Station will ship with every Konzu. To upgrade that to a Premium Brushed Aluminum/Wood stand add $39/$49 to your contribution for each Konzu in your reward you wish to upgrade. If you need more than one charging station (home/office) add $19/$49/$59 to your contribution depending on the model as shown in the table above for each additional charging station.The battery pack is removable & interchangeable. It can be charged directly via USB like other battery packs. Carrying Konzu with its battery pack into an airplane would be no different from carrying an ordinary battery pack. * Patents Pending Barracuda Konzu’s revolutionary Push-2-Lock system is the ultimate solution to pickpockets. Without compromising on usability with awkward hidden zippers or having to individually lock each zipper — Konzu's 4 external zippers (2 main and 2 pockets) can be secured with the push of a single button on the strap. The lock can be engaged with zipper pullers in any position with no power source required. Pressing down/up the lock will instantly lock/unlock the zippers in any position. It only seems like magic.* Patents Pending Ever find you’ve been walking with an open bag, just ripe for pickpocketing? Barracuda Konzu takes smart to a whole new level with integrated sensors that detect and alert you if you walk off with your bag open. Along with our Push-2-Lock system, this provides two-factor protection when you’re on the move.   * Patents PendingNo more awkward selfies. No more odd-man-out group shots. No more needing to find a good Samaritan to take a picture of you and your special someone. With Konzu’s detachable camera mount add-on and accompanying Bluetooth camera clicker, taking a photo of yourself or your group couldn’t be easier. The camera mount monopod attaches securely to an adaptor affixed to the bottom of the backpack, making it very stable. In addition to taking a selfie or a group (a “groupie”?) you can attach a GoPro and capture all the action on a hike or bike ride with ease.  The camera mount includes: A telescoping adjustable stand, attachments for phone/camera (like GoPro), adaptor affixed to the backpack into which the stand docks and a bluetooth clicker that works with Android and iOS.To get this camera mount accessory add $29 to your pledge.* Patents Pending Open every door in style—without ever misplacing your keys again. A perfectly located key pocket and heavy-duty retractable cord. This will also work well with scan cards and key fobs to get in and out of secured doors.* Patents Pending
Pokémon Go draining your battery? Or need to make that important call and your mobile phone is almost dead? Fear not: Konzu’s external US port is all you need. It’s built-in, 10,000 mAh wirelessly charged battery pack will keep you on the move long after your mobile devices would otherwise konk out. Need a place to stash that windbreaker or bike helmet, and there’s no more room in the backpack? No worries. Our expandable strap system gives you the extra little bit of storage you need to get your go on, in style. That’s right. Hit the security line without having to dig out your laptop and throw it in a tray. Just unzip the TSA-approved laptop sleeve and your Konzu conquers the conveyor belt with everything intact and ready to zip up and go.This section has two pockets, on the left for the laptop and the right for a tablet. The laptop pocket can fit a laptop up 17" in size.  Skimmers can scram. The Konzu’s RFID-shielded pockets keep your personal data safe and secure. No breach at the beach. No treachery on the morning train. Who says you have to sacrifice style for comfort? Not Konzu, which comes with padding that makes even the heaviest of backpack loads a breeze. Konzu's pads are also designed to maximize airflow to keep your back cool and comfortable. You’ll wish everything in life came with padding like this.  The backpack can easily be attached to the handle of a carry-on —especially if you have a Barracuda carry-on. "Everything is designed. Few things are designed well. – Brian Reed."      Advanced water resistant lightweight fabric and covered zippers keep the inside dry.We didn't just want to design another backpack or just throw in a battery pack and call it smart. We set out to design THE backpack, a backpack like no other and we think we have succeeded. Now help us get it to market and get yourself this most amazing backpack at an equally amazing price. 
 Get two of the most innovative travel gear products ever made in an even more incredible deal. The Barracuda Carry-on is smart collapsible carry-on that backers like you helped bring to market. The carry-on is packed with cutting edge features like a built-in laptop tray and ergonomic handle. Learn more at https://barracuda.co/. Travel in style like never before.   
 Some might correctly point out that we had published a timeline like this for our last campaign and we were delayed by over 10 months in shipping out the rewards. We have come a long way since then. The company was a garage startup started by silicon valley software engineers with little experience in the complexities of manufacturing and shipping real world products. But now having manufactured and shipped thousands of products across the world we are far more capable of staying on schedule. This is not to say that we might not run into technical difficulties developing this fairly complex and cutting edge product. We are confident in our abilities to deal with delays and minimize their impact.As you may notice, the current prototypes featured in this campaign are already of high quality developed in partnership with a top manufacturer, a far cry from the garage made prototype of our previous campaign. We are Barracuda. We have a passion for creating products that push the outer edge of imagination. We design products that blend cutting edge technology with innovative design. We strive to create products that make its peers obsolete. Help us bring Konzu: The World's Most Advanced Backpack to market.

story:
Note* For viewers in China please visit my youku page to view my pitch trailer.

iCurious Travel: A Cultural China Guide for the 21st Century Traveler. 

Can travel make the world a more peaceful and prosperous place? I believe it can.

It is my dream to prove that by connecting more people and sharing across cultures the result of this interaction can indeed save humanity. Pretty big dream right?

For the past two years I have worked in the tourism and hospitality industry as a translator and guide in a small rural village in Yunnan Province in Southwest China. During that time, I have developed three assumptions regarding international tourism and the construction of cultural bridges.

1. There is an immense curiosity in the US and the West about traveling to China, however most people lack the linguistic and cultural fluency to get around while in China or even know where to start when planning a trip.

2. The current form of mass tourism in China and around the world is unsustainable, but there are positive trends of more sophistication and DIY Travel. For example, new technology such as interactive mapping, online language training, and self booking websites are making quality and independent international travel more accesible deflating these mutually held misconceptions..

3. Connecting people and places online and in person over universal values such as family, food, and fun are essential in creating a more peaceful and prosperous 21st century Earth.

The solution is to link these three trends together in a new type of travel that incorporates personal growth, social entrepreneurship and mobile technology. I will present this manifesto in a cultural travel guide on Southwest China to be released on iBook for iPads in the Spring of 2013.

This is iCurious Travel.

Direction:

iCurious Travel will be a new type of China travel guide explaining and highlighting cultural and language information through podcasts, videos, photos, creative writing, and slideshow presentations. This iBook will be sold both online and through download on the ipad. The goal of this project is to create a prototype for the next generation of digital, cloud based, and crowd sourced travel guides that can be downloaded through the itunes app store. 

The inspiration for this project originated while learning how to weave bamboo baskets in myspare time with an elderly couple in a neighboring village. Through studying this craft I was able to connect on a personal level given the language barrier. The couple could only speak their native Bai language and a thick Yaccent offset of mandarin. Regardless, I was able to learn more than just how to cut thin strips of bamboo. More importantly I learned more about myself including patience, persistence, and courage. 

Building off this momentum, I want to travel to more places in Southwest China and learn more culture, the people who practice them, as well as learn more about myself in the process. From my experience I can relay this information to other travelers who want to participate in their own adventure in more remote places in China. 

For a more in depth look at the theme, structure, and topics that will be covered in the iBook please visit my tumblr blog here.

Tools and Technology:

The prototype travel guide will be built using a new application call iBooks Author. This application allows anyone with a mac computer to publish multimedia textbooks directly to iPads ready for distribution anywhere in the world.

What is exciting for young entrepreneurs and travelers like me is that alongside Apple and Indiegogo, other forms of social media and communication technology are knocking down invisible barriers that used to inhibit communication, and idea sharing.

Execution:

In order to complete this project, I will explore China's Southwest provinces by bicycle, hiking, bus and other forms of low impact transportation during the summer and fall of 2012. Southwest China is home to the most geographically, linguistically, and culturally diverse areas in China. This area is rich in intangible cultural heritage that can't be found in places like Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou. Preserving and promoting this culture is a main goal of iCurious Travel.

Chinese language social media will be a key component in finding valuable people and resources in China to connect with. Already I have built a small following on the Chinese versiono of twitter called Weibo. That number expands everyday. English language social media will be key in distributing and promoting this idea of @iCurious Travel. 

As I do my research most of the raw and barely edited content will make its way to my tumblr blog along with other random insights and thoughts. 

You can catch the action at www.icurioustravel.tumblr.com

Expenses and Infrastructure 

The money that I raise will go directly toward

- Hiring a small team to help with editing and production, travel logistics, and social online marketing for both Chinese and English language markets.

- Investment in recording and camera equipment as well as professional post production work to make this book as polished as possible.

-Travel expenses for myself and assistant to visit 12 different locations in 5 different provinces across China. (Guizhou, Guangxi, Sichuan, Yunnan, Xinjiang)

-Website design and maintenance.

Support:

Monetary donations are welcome and the perks you purchasing are really enjoyable and unique. Since rural China is still developing and the cost of living is low, every dollar goes a long way. 

In addition to financial support, human networks are just as important. You can help in other ways by referring this campaign and my other social media sites to family and friends in your network.

What is extremely important to understand is that I am just one of many of an entire generation of young and bright Americans and other Westerners who have traveled abroad to China in search of a more fulfilling and dynamic lifestyle. There are thousands of us currently connecting small fibers to a much larger cultural bridge. I hope to represent this group of people, and will also depend on their support as well.

I am also extremely grateful for the patience and grace from a bunch of really great and impressive Chinese people I have had the pleasure of knowing during my stay here. ä¸­å›½åŠ æ²¹ï¼

Have a nice day!

Anthony Paglino å°è™Ž

story:
• Who Are We? •

We share the common interests of portraying people as well as doing documentary work. Planning a work trip to Amsterdam (NL) we came up with this idea of travelling on the road instead of just taking a flight, and doing people's portraits along the way. 

We share the common interests of portraying people as well as doing documentary work. Planning a work trip to Amsterdam (NL) we came up with this idea of travelling on the road instead of just taking a flight, and doing people’s portraits along the way.

We love the ideia of being able to photograph anyone regardless of their social status, gender, age, etc. The plan is to set up the portable studio setting in the most uncommon places and try to portray the person isolated from their surroundings. At the end we will compare portraits: are people from Portugal different from the French? Are there similarities in people’s expressions, haircuts? Do Northern look more sad?

We will be photographing and filming the entire process, feeding a little daily video to our blog and facebook page, and later these images will be compiled into a beautiful high quality photobook, made at our official partners at Koy Lab, accompanied by the documentary. We will also exhibit the final work in two different locations (at least), one at our departure point – Lisbon – and the other at our destination – Amsterdam.

This campaign will pretty much help fund most of our project and sell it in advance to be able to happen on the go. In fact, by contributing you are buying the project in the making, whilst helping us achieve the funds needed for the production costs of this project. You will always get something back for your investment.
  • We've set up a blog where you can follow everything: Portrait Route
  • Our exhibition in Lisbon is happening at Fábrica de Braço de Prata in February: Fábrica de Braço de Prata
  • Our exhibition in Amsterdam does not yet have a date, but will happen at ACTA: ACTA Gebrouw
You can also follow us on:
  • fb.com/portraitroute
  • intagr.am/portraitroute
  • twitter.com/portraitroute
  • vimeo.com/portraitroute

• What We Need •

We are estimating to be on the road for a total of 20 days, commuting between cities, setting up the backdrop and most and foremost, photographing. Even if we'd be living off the minimum costs of around 50€ per person for stays and some food, that's an overall of nearly 3000€ just on these basic things, not counting petrol, tolls, or other production costs that are inherent.
* UPDATE 29/10/2014 *
Europe's Famous Hostels are sponsoring our stays, so we are now just fundraising for petrol, tolls, food and some inherent production costs (running websites, hosts fees, international communications, etc).

Our departure date is October 13th and we return to Lisbon on November 2nd. Our desired route is just over 5600 kms, and should roughly follow the route Lisbon - Bilbao - Paris - Bruges - Amsterdam - Grenoble - Marseille - Barcelona - Madrid - Lisbon, which will cost an estimate of 1400€ on tolls and petrol alone.


• What You Get •

  • A bespoke hand-made book made especially for our Indiegogo supporters by our partners at Koy Lab. This will have no less than 50 pages, and will be numbered and personally signed to thank you!
  • A selection of prints of our ongoing work. As you will be paying for this upfront, you will have the choice of which print you'll want us to send you. It will be hand-signed.
  • 2 exhibitions - 1 in Lisbon and 1 in Amsterdam. Here we will showcase not only the images but also display the documentary in a private viewing that ALL our Indiegogo supporters will be invited to join.

    • Other Ways You Can Help• 

    And if you would like to help us in other ways... we would love if you could:

    • Share our campaign with your friends;
    • Join us on Facebook and subscribe our blog;
    • Perhaps suggest services or people that could help us; partnerships, sponsorships..
    • Join a photoshoot! Dates are as follow:
      9 Nov - Paris
      15 Nov - Amsterdam
      22 Nov - Barcelona
      26 Nov - Madrid
      (if you have any questions concerning this, please send us an email - portraitroute@gmail.com)

    • What If We Don't Make It? •

    Thanks to our sponsors and contributors, we ARE going :)

story:
The Harvey Pass area south of Fernie has long been a popular backcountry ski destination.  With infamous runs such as Curve Ball, Wild Thing, Romi’s Midnight Run and Next of Kin all accessed from the high mountain forestry road pass.

Being so remote (over 40km on forestry roads from Fernie) backcountry recreationists of all stripes have made varying attempts at building shelters in this area for over 40 years.  The first known shelter was destroyed when the area was logged in the early 80’s, it was later replaced by a makeshift log round structure in the 90’s, and as it neared the end of it’s life another structure was built to replace it in the early 2000’s. The most recent hut was destroyed in a fire.  Other huts have also been built and removed in varying other locations in the region.

None of these structures or the ski terrain has ever been acknowledged officially by BC government on the crown land or by the private landholders who also own some land in the area.

Working with the support of a broad user group of backcountry skiers, snowboarders and snowmobilers, the Fernie Trails & Ski Touring club submitted an application to the BC Government to create an official recreation site at the main hut location.

There is also a potential opportunity to work with the private land managers in the Harvey Pass area to establish other huts in adjacent ski terrain.

As a new project for the club, we are seeking to raise new funds to help support the building of an authorized warming hut at Harvey Pass and the establishment of an official BC recreation site.

Help make this project a reality!
