story:
WE DID IT!

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for following us on this journey and backing Awakening your HAPPINESS Hotel experience. Because of your generosity and backing, we’ve increased our Friends & Family circle, we have future guest confirmed ready to book their reservation, and we have a HAPPY community around us, sharing support and love around us. This is a HUGE WIN!   However the journey is not over yet,  this is just the beginning and there is some more few step to complete our 100%  of funding. If you are interested in more information, please contact us.

Our perks are still available to offer more people the opportunity to be part of our community and to be one of our First Guest to visit Awakening. We will keep you updated on our journey, sign up for updates at Awakening.mx.

We’ll keep you updated every step of the way.

 But for now, it’s time to CELEBRATE!

________________________________________________________________

WHY DOES AWAKENING EXIST?

HOW HAS IT ALL STARTED

 

For many years, Martin had the vision and dream of creating a hotel experience that combines action sports and adventure with personal development activities. This dream never materialized due to a lack of time, hotel experience, and a real local network - until he met Adriana, a full-blooded hotelier with 15 years of hotel experience in the Riviera Maya. She had even already created the Awakening brand and a travel concept that allows diving deeply into the mysteries of Mayan culture - a perfect match. So they joined forces, in business and in life, to turn their dream into reality and thus following down the path of their own AWAKENING.  

 

AWAKENING AWARDS - SHORTLISTED TWICE... 

...FOR BEST INTERNATIONAL HOTEL DESIGN AWARD

 

 

AWAKENING - IN THE NEWS... 

...BECAUSE OF ITS ORIGINAL CONCEPT & DESIGN

____________________________________________________

INTRODUCING AWAKENING

CONCEPT & DESIGN

TRAVEL TO AN INCREDIBLE DESTINATION

Travel to the latest destination in Riviera Maya on the border of an amazing biosphere reserve. Our fresh water lagoon will mesmerize you with the amazing colors of Caribbean water. Our jungle canopy will caress your inner sanctuary. The Mayan culture and spirit will open new perspectives and horizons. And your cocoon will spoil you with comfort, incredible views and extraordinary "barefoot luxury" while making you feel one with nature.

CONNECT WITH NATURE, YOUR BELOVED ONES AND, MOST IMPORTANTLY,  WITH YOURSELF

Re-connecting to this moment - this is what Awakening essentially is all about. Once you connect to nature, you connect to everything. Living this present moment with all of your attention will create a deeper connection with your loved ones, with new friends and especially with yourself. Awakening lives this reality, and we express it in the design of physical spaces, experiences, the service and the concept as a whole.    

BE HAPPY BY BOOSTING YOUR PHYSICAL, EMOTIONAL AND SPIRITUAL WELL-BEING 

We create and spread happiness - for our guests, our employees, our surroundings and also for ourselves. So beyond a great time away from everyday life, we provide the opportunity to engage in Awakening experiences that promote physical, emotional and spiritual well-being. Our guests choose the level and depth of their experience,  which can reach from "just a fun and relaxing vacation" to personalized well-being programs, designed by our personal development and happiness coaches, so everybody can take a piece of sustained happiness back home.

 

____________________________________________________

OUR HOME – LAGUNA NOPALITOS

QUINTANA ROO, TULUM, MEXICO

                      

 

Awakening is located on the shores of the Laguna Nopalitos on the Caribbean coast of Mexico, 19 km/12 miles south of Tulum, one of LATAM’s most popular and fastest growing tourist destinations. Laguna Nopalitos looks like a Caribbean beach but actually is a "Cenote" filled with crystal clear fresh water. Fed by one of the world's largest underground river systems, it is surrounded by extensive, uninhabited mangrove and jungle. While close enough to all the amazing tourist attractions the region has to offer, its position right on the border of Sian Ka’an, Mexico’s largest natural biosphere reserve and UNESCO World Heritage Site, protects it from any type of large scale development.

What is a Cenote and what makes it special?

A "Cenote" is a surface connection to subterranean water bodies. In the case of Laguna Nopalitos, an asteroid fractured the Earth’s surface and created this freshwater body that is connected to the sea via underground rivers. The Awakening Site occupies 230 meters of Laguna Nopalitos' shore and contains an additional seven smaller cenotes that we found in the jungle. The water of a cenote provides vitamin and mineral rich algae that nourish the skin, while also providing adventure and fun for many water sports activities. Cenotes were considered sacred by the ancient Mayans and many still claim to be able to feel the energy or even interact with "Aluxes" and other magical creatures. We have not met them yet, but Laguna Nopalitos certainly is a magical place. 

​

____________________________________________________

OUR EXPERIENCE - TRAVEL TO GROW

DESIGNED TO PROMOTE HAPPINESS

Which is our mission?

Our mission is to offer our guests an extraordinary, potentially transformational TRAVEL experience that combines high-end comfort, profound relaxation, exhilarating adventure and tons of fun with the option to engage in personal development activities for our body, mind, and spirit. At Awakening our guests RECONNECT with nature, with others and ultimately with themselves as they take a step beyond just a vacation, taking home great memories, new perspectives and skills, and increased consciousness for an even HAPPIER, healthier and more abundant life.

Creating well-being and happiness is our mission. So in addition to an unprecedented location, we offer our signature AWAKENING PROGRAMS, designed by our transformation experts for those seeking a more profound personal development experiences and connection with themselves. Individual guided tours and recreational activities for you to renew your creativity, initiative, sensuality, passion, romance, friendship, family… or whatever part of your life that you would like to "awaken".

AWAKENING PROGRAM EXAMPLES

____________________________________________________

OUR ARCHITECTURAL DESIGN PHILOSOPHY

  DESIGNED TO CONNECT AND EVOLVE

Inspired by our Awakening philosophy about happiness, personal growth, and connection, our architectural team came up with an extraordinary design concept.

WE DESIGNED A COCOON (OR "CAPULLO") AND OTHER AMENITIES... 

Our understanding of a hotel room is a "Cocoon", designed to protect and help you evolve.  

... THAT MIMIC NATURE'S SHAPES AND FORMS...

The organic lines are based on geometry found in the natural forms of nature. Not by replicating these forms, but by understanding and applying the rules governing them.

...AND USE ELEMENTS OF SACRED GEOMETRY

"Sacred geometry" has its roots in the study of nature. We use elements of sacred geometry to synchronize you inside the "Cocoon" with your surroundings and, ultimately, the Universe.

____________________________________________________

OUR "CAPULLOS'" INTERIOR

 "BAREFOOT LUXURY" - BEYOND A HOTEL ROOM...

Awakening is made for travelers seeking extraordinary and exclusive experiences combined with what we call "barefoot luxury". To us, nature is the ultimate luxury so our version of luxury has nothing to do with marble floors and golden faucets, but revolves around providing a way to experience nature in the most fun and comfortable way possible. So you can smell the jungle, feel part of nature and listen to the orchestra of life while being embraced by comfort and intimacy.

 

 

 

HOTEL FACT SHEET

A SMALL, BUT HIGH-END ECO-BOUTIQUE HOTEL WITH A MAXIMUM OF 40 ROOMS

 

 

____________________________________________________

SUSTAINABILITY

 HOW WE MANAGE OUR ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT

Mother Nature is the main protagonist in our experience so a design integrated with and adapted to nature is a key component of our concept. We are implementing high standards of sustainability in our architectural design, construction, and operation in order to minimize environmental impact. We are striving to be a leader in the area of sustainable hotel operation in the Riviera Maya. Use of clean energy, waste reduction strategies, and high-end water treatment will allow us to minimize environmental impact. Low impact building materials are just one element of our sustainability strategy:

____________________________________________________

SOCIAL IMPACT

 SPREADING HAPPINESS IS OUR CONTRIBUTION

 

Awakening will generate impact by increasing happiness on three levels: 

 

 

_________________________________________________________

 

AWAKENING FOUNDERS

The Driving Force Behind the Concept

As a couple working together, we can further deepen our relationship based on respect, freedom, and individuality, facing the challenges that working together involve and thus strengthening our spiritual connection and profound love.

 

"Is it always easy to be a mother, father, lover, best friend and business partner at the same time – of course not. But especially overcoming our challenges, consciously and with lots of love and mutual respect, is our path of personal growth, our path towards our own “Awakening”.

Att: Adri y Martin

 

OUR "AWAKENED" TEAM

OUTSTANDING EXPERTISE & EXCEPTIONAL HUMAN BEINGS

The key to realizing our entrepreneurial dream of Awakening is the team we gather around us. While excellence in their respective area of expertise is of course very important, we also make sure that we have strong ties forged between us by common values and a shared vision: to awaken and spread happiness around our precious planet:

 

AWAKENING PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT PARTNERS

OUR DREAM TEAM FOR YOUR PERKS AND BEYOND

Our own guides have strongly influenced our personal and professional development and, as a consequence, have inspired part of our vision for Awakening.

These guides are already part of our team today and happy to help you continue on your own personal Awakening path. No reason to wait - you can start investing in yourself now by selecting one of our perks...  

 

________________________________________________________

 

________________________________________________________

CONTRIBUTORS WANTED

WHAT IS IN IT FOR US - WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU 

 

It is time to introduce AWAKENING to the world and spread the invitation to start investing in yourself. We made sure to wait until we were sufficiently far along with development before inviting you to back Awakening.

 

 

 

Why Crowdfunding:

We as the founding team invest approximately 150K USD ourselves plus two years of our work, still, significant additional funds are required.

We have been approached by several interested investors and know that we will find financing and turn Awakening into a reality. However, we would like to strengthen our personal investment position before entering more deeply into investor negotiations to make sure we maintain a comfortable majority vote in the business. Why is that important to us? Awakening has a mission – to create and spread happiness. Yes, we will be making profit – for the business, for our future shareholders and for ourselves, but that is not the main purpose. Maintaining a comfortable majority share, and consequently vote in Awakening, will help us protect the essence of Awakening and keep a good balance between financial, social and environmental value creation.

What have we done and invested into up to now?

  • Concept Development
  • Land search and contracting
  • Branding and communication
  • Architectural design concept
  • Environmental, topographical and geological studies
  • Detailed design and engineering of the “Capullo” and all other facilities. 

What are we looking for?

  • Contributors that share our vision of creating this new hotel experience. 
  • Financial contributions
  • Other contribution such as knowledge sharing, contacts, and maybe even volunteering

How much do we need and what will your contributions will be used for?

  • We are looking for 50,000 USD of funding. These funds will be used to...:
  • Finalize Capullo design and to construct the first Capullo (09/2017-08/2018)
  • Further, develop and launch our “Awakening Programs” (we plan to launch and test these programs before the actual hotel construction is complete). 

What do we offer?

Participation in our social, environmental, and conscious business – an opportunity to improve lives and be part of the AWAKENING Family. And, of course, we have many great perks that allow us to provide...:

  • Early bird discounts and co-founder benefits for our first hotel guests
  • Awakening programs for those ready to embark on their own personal Awakening 
  • Opportunities to connect with our local Mayan community and their “Abuelos” (Sages) that are happy to share their wisdom and healing powers.

* What Terms & Conditions apply to our Perks?  

For all Perks:

  • After choosing your Perk you will receive a personalized certificate via email.  
  • With this certificate, please contact us to check availability and make your reservation.
  • All Perk offerings are subject to availability.
  • Individual sessions will be scheduled based on your and the trainer's availability. For Group sessions, we will provide the session's execution dates (several options will be provided).

For Room Night Perks:

  • Your Room Night Perk certificate will be valid once the hotel has started operation and remains valid for the next three years after the opening date (planned for Q4/2018).  
  • When you call to make your reservation, we will ask for your Perk certificate number and the donor's name. All certificates can only be used once and cannot be replicated.   
  • Blackout dates may apply
  • These Perks are created specifically for this Crowdfunding campaign and cannot be combined with any other offer, current or future hotel promotions or discounts.
  • The Perk is valid for two adults with a max of two children under 12 years old. Additional guests may cause additional cost. 
  • Perks do not include any applicable prevailing government taxes at time of occupancy.
  • Service Charge not included in Perk amount.

What To Do Next?  

Please go on the top of the page and press "Back it" or "Respaldar" and fell free to shoose the amount of donation..... or........ choose your favorite PERK.

FOLLOW US and SHARE:

https://www.facebook.com/awakeningrivieramaya/

https://www.instagram.com/awakeningrivieramaya/

https://twitter.com/AdrianaChardi

 

CONNECT WITH US: connect@awakening.mx

VISIT US AT https://awakening.mx

THANK YOU!

ADRI Y MARTIN

This is a HUGE WIN!   However the journey is not over yet,  this is just the beginning and there is some more few step to complete our 100%  of funding. If you are interested in more information, please contact us.Our perks are still available to offer more people the opportunity to be part of our community and to be one of our First Guest to visit Awakening. story:
Laguan with the Wind

It all started with a dream.  A dream to find a home, but no direction other than -making it to the Yukon.  The Laguan's have shown many of us the beauty that lies in our own backyards.  They have done what far too many of us think as unthinkable.  They have given up jobs, housing and a city they know to discover something new!  this is scary in it's own accord, but to do it with a four year old?!  Incredible.  

Molly has been a trooper and a star of many of the photos, outshines even the truly magnificent back drop of our beautiful country Canada!

They packed up all the essentials and whatever else they could stuff into a minivan and set off only knowing their next location, unknowing for how long or where their next step might be.  They have met many a good souls as they begin the hard, yet rewarding physical journey of WWOOFing.  Living off the land and in quarters provided by people who equally need their help.

The courage, strength and perseverance that this journey takes is unfathomable to the majority of us.  We are far too comfortable living where we are, even if it's not THAT comfortable - at least we know where our pay checks are coming from and when.  We have our friends close by to help if we are in a pinch and we are there to offer assistance in return.  The Laguan's may not be close by location - but friends they are and assistance they need.  

"So, stuck in Whitehorse at a $100 a night hotel, the Stratford. No other cheaper options at the moment. Nobody can look at the van until Monday. Molly has a cold and we only have a handful of our belongings. But we are safe, warm and the shower here happens to be kick-ass. 

The repair may be anywhere from $200-3000. We wont know until Monday. Ten thousand kilometers driven and perhaps it all ends with a bloody rock. It may be best to pawn our things and then fly home. But where is home? 

So, we wait. Molly sneezing but in good spirits and eating chicken soup ramen. We have ups and downs all day long, but another day is down as we get closer to deciding which road laguanwiththewind takes.
g'night folks."  Taken from https://www.facebook.com/laguanwiththewind?hc_l...  

If you haven't, then I encourage you to take  look at their remarkable journey at the link above or at their Blogspot - http://laguanwiththewind.blogspot.com.  Look at the beautiful photos and journal that the Laguan's have acquired and just imagine the life experience lil' Molly has gained.    Share this, and their Facebook group with your friends and family.  Give what you can.  A little can go a long ways!

story:
Hello Backers and Supporters,


The New and improved Laser Engraver Mini white Box is here! We are very excited at the moment to announce this good news



What is Laser Engraver Mini white BenBox: The cost-effective laser box is an entry level desktop cutter or engraver design for hobbyists. Its technology is by using powerful laser to cut paper and engrave wood,   leather,bamboo, plastic,and other materials.



  The Laser Engraver Mini White BenBox operating On Controller 3.61 to Send G-code to the machine.
No  kits to mess with no miss parts no assemble need just set and run.

Mini White BenBox Engraving on: Wood ,Plastic,and Paper, gift card,

on the arm of sunglasses, chocolate & Bar Code & Coffee Stir Stick and will cut thin lite foam for  copying & painting.



 How did the Mini White BenBox come out?

We have been studying and thinking about how to use these source to make an Mini Laser Engraving box .This ideal Laser box could need do high work-capable , easy to use, carried  and enjoyable! For this goal, We explored on internet and collect all valuable knowledge and hardware necessaries. We went to a manufacture ,  we made a few  White BenBox in June. We did sell some of the  Mini White BenBox . The response was good from our buyers. As a belief , we wanted the Mini White BenBox to more desirable, both of it  form, shape and duties. Finally with a few tweaking, we made advance new Mini White BenBox.  we were so excited!



Goals
$5,000 | Thanks to all the Backers! Go to work immediately placing and send out orders. After all the order are send out to the Backers, We will be redesigning a new shape and more colors for the next funding.


What are the characteristics of the Laser White BenBox improvements:

1. 2.5X laser intensity: truly 250mW laser head, more higher speed, support more types of materials.

2. 2.5X engraving area: 8cm * 7.5 cm carving area.

3. Fixed engraving platform: improved locating system, both X & Y axes are positioned by moving the laser head. More heavier objects can be carved, carving result more clearly and stabilized.

4. One-step molding technology injection molding plastic shell and accessories: more beautiful and solid

5. Low noise

6. Software upgrade to 2.0: support vector outline Engraving, more features, more stable.

The machine features:

1) has a gray scale printing function

2) Laser power adjustable

3) burn time is adjustable engraved

4) has a low-light positioning function

5) with a free positioning function

6) the software is simple. (Multi-language, the system displays in English.

7) the USB interface for  laptop and desktop.

  • Product Name: White BenBox
  •  1. Fixed engraving platform.
  • 1. 2.5x Laser intensity turly 250mw laser Head.
  • 1. Safety Glasses 
  • 1. Power Supply
  • 1. USB Cable
  • 1.Software
  • Package Size: 23.0 * 23.0 * 21.0 ( cm )

Risks and challenges Learn about accountability on this site.

We have been working closely and building up a strong relationship with our suppliers since the past few years. and we are insured from these problems that may come about. The confidence to ensure stock and lead-times are within our production requirements; and ensure New White Benbox met the highest standard.
story_txt:
Hello Backers and Supporters, 

The New and improved Laser Engraver Mini white Box is here! We are very excited at the moment to announce this good news 
What is Laser Engraver Mini white BenBox: The cost-effective laser box is an entry level desktop cutter or engraver design for hobbyists. Its technology is by using powerful laser to cut paper and engrave wood,   leather,bamboo, plastic,and other materials.
  The Laser Engraver Mini White BenBox operating On Controller 3.61 to Send G-code to the machine.No  kits to mess with no miss parts no assemble need just set and run.Mini White BenBox Engraving on: Wood ,Plastic,and Paper, gift card,on the arm of sunglasses, chocolate & Bar Code & Coffee Stir Stick and will cut thin lite foam for  copying & painting.
 How did the Mini White BenBox come out?We have been studying and thinking about how to use these source to make an Mini Laser Engraving box .This ideal Laser box could need do high work-capable , easy to use, carried  and enjoyable! For this goal, We explored on internet and collect all valuable knowledge and hardware necessaries. We went to a manufacture ,  we made a few  White BenBox in June. We did sell some of the  Mini White BenBox . The response was good from our buyers. As a belief , we wanted the Mini White BenBox to more desirable, both of it  form, shape and duties. Finally with a few tweaking, we made advance new Mini White BenBox.  we were so excited!
 






Goals
$5,000 | Thanks to all the Backers! Go to work immediately placing and send out orders. After all the order are send out to the Backers, We will be redesigning a new shape and more colors for the next funding.

story:
We're FLET

  • Who wouldn’t prefer a cold beer while having a party with friends?
  • What if your juice and smoothies can stay fresh and cold all day?
  • How many times your coffee diluted by ice when a few hours passed?

You’re not going to like it when this happen to your coffee

These are questions lead to our new product, FLET tumbler. We design a stick which we called it FLET at the middle of the tumbler to keep your favorite drinks in iced cold temperature. All you have to do is just put it in a freezer then snap it into the tumbler.

How it use

 

What's inside FLET tumbler package?

 

 

Product specification

FLET stick performance

 

2 times used per 1 frozen FLET stick

With a strong magnetic force, FLET stick can hold firmly to the tumbler

 

Grab and go with 2 FLET sticks, it's easier and faster

Features and design 

 

FLET stick is design specifically for FLET tumbler

2 ways lid design - Sip 

2 ways lid design - Straw

Compact lid to prevent spilling drinks

Anti slip bottom silicone

 

Suitable for dish washing machine

Why FLET tumbler is cool for all beverages?

 


Beer enthusiast can keep their favorites in original taste all night, our capacity is equal to a pint

Coffee head will be fantasize the pure taste of cold brew in FLET tumbler

Let FLET tumbler be your friend wherever you go

 

Perfectly place in every cup holder

 

Save our planet

 

Food delivery has become one of the most growing business around the world. One time used plastics cutlery come along with these delivery. 

How many ton of plastic wastes we've thrown it away ?    

The nature has been restored after we’ve spend the time during quarantine period in COVID-19 pandemic. And please, it’s our duty to take care the mother earth

 Think carefully before you order iced drinks 

 

In some country, we found lots of unhygienic ice production. Worker using their feet to slide ice cubes on the floor. That is not a good thing for daily consumable product.

 Comparing FLET with others

 

Product collection

 

Equal

Pastel Pink

Ice Mint

Navy Blue​

Stainless

FLET stick

FLET stick and FLET stick case as add-on option

Our story and conceptual design 

We're now facing a global warming issue and not only artic glacier in the north pole melts. We’re all familiar when ice diluted into our drink after a few hours passed. Take a look on the problems below, we’re sure that at least one of them is ever happened to you.

No iced cold drinks when partying with friends outdoor in a hot day.

There’s still beer left in the bottle but it’s not that enjoyable coldness anymore.

Ice melt into orange juice and the taste is wartery with an orange smell.

The answer of all above is FLET Tumbler.

FLET tumbler an excellent designed tumbler to keep the freshness and original taste in all kind of cold beverages and we add the stick in the center of the cup where we called FLET stick. This design is to maintain or reduce the temperature of the drinks to reach most of people demand. FLET stick can snap into the tumbler with a strong magnetic force. 

FLET tumbler is grab to go easily, we researched the average human hand size all over the world, the outer diameter size is very comfortable to use with one hand.

We use food grade Stainless Steel material with double wall vacuum design with FLET. It’s endurance and no swirling clang noise that occurs when you put ice in stainless steel tumbler.

FLET stick inspiration came from the woodwind musical instrument. You’ll reach a new experience of your drinks like a classical flute playing around you in every single sip.

FLET and fresh are homophones. Our conceptual design is based on the original freshness of the drinks. The brand logo represent the minimal design of the tumbler shape with FLET stick.

 

Our team

 Timeline 

Risks & Challenges

We’ve been working on FLET for over a year, from the beginning idea to our sketching paper to 3D prototype design.

We created the first revision prototype in our backyard and we tested our prototypes numerously, we gave them to sample users in different lifestyles and their feedback helped us develop FLET until it’s fit in your hand.

Many manufacturers were sorted out until we found the right one that understand our conceptual design of FLET.

After consulting them for six months, our good relationship with manufacturer lead to the confidence in minimizing the risk of production. We’ll make sure the confirm delivery date is the actual ‘confirm’ date.

We set up the conference call with our manufacturer weekly to track the process progression and control the product quality to reach our expectation. Since the prototypes testing process, we also delivered them to our friends by using our logistic agent to make sure there’ll be no unforeseen issues when FLET launch.

The last challenge is the global situation on Corona virus, we shall pass through this with our manufacturer eventually. We take full responsibility for our product, you’ll be the first one to know the updates from us. Every product we ship will be alcohol sanitizer sprayed. We're FLET Co. and we work as a team.

story:
# Guitars are so big and difficult to transport.  Isn’t there a guitar that I can easily carry with me anywhere I go?

 Anyone who has performed with a guitar has dreamt of a compact, lightweight guitar that can be taken anywhere with ease.
 If you’re looking for design, portability, and practicality all combined into one guitar, check out Guitar Klang Version 2, with a new look meant especially for travelers!!
 
 Whether you’re going to work, the cafe, the park, on vacation, or your own special place—anywhere and anytime you might want a compact, lightweight, and attractive guitar to bring with you, the newly imagined Klang Version 2 will be the perfect solution.

# Klang Version 2?

 

 Klang’s initial release in 2016 introduced an instrument offering a new concept of stylish portability and unique design standards.
 The new look of Version 2 comes after three years of addressing player feedback and improving shortcomings, all to enhance the appeal of acoustic instruments with this brand new model.

# What has been improved?

Design — While Version 1 was designed with the essence of a traditional instrument, the new model Version 2 has been crafted with a more sophisticated and stable design in mind.

Performability — With the original model, some performers noted uncomfortable positioning of the instrument as the most difficult aspect, so with this model we have taken great care to make an instrument with a sense of balance that anyone can immediately feel comfortable playing.

Convenience — This model’s newly applied tuning pegs offer smooth tuning as well as freely adjustable pitch and string height, making for a more intuitive tuning process than with the original model.

Volume — Based on data collected from the instruments already produced, we have designed a more precise layout and secured the internal sound chamber to maximize volume.

# Dong Jin Jo Guitar Workshop?

 Dong Jin Jo Guitar Workshop is a handcrafted instrument workshop led by Joh Dong Jin.  He has developed the Klang brand by utilizing the knowledge and knowhow he has accumulated with over 10 years of experience.
 Rather than replicating preexisting instruments, he has focused his efforts on creating instruments that reflect his own personality and talents.

# Isn’t the volume kind of low?

 Not at all!  The new Version 2 model offers a larger soundbox than the original model and the sophisticated layout has reduced unnecessary parts, allowing for an ample sound range of 30-80 decibels.
  In addition, the sound-hole has been redirected towards the performer to make the sound more audible.

# How small and lightweight is it?

 Klang has a total length of 640mm and a weight of 650g.  At half the length and only a third the weight of standard guitars, Klang’s portability ensures you can take it with you anytime, anywhere.

# Detail spec

nut : 43mm
top : solid spruce
body : solid mahogany
scale : 510mm
fretboard : rosewood
bridge : headless type bridge
string : steel strings

# Detail images

# About the funding campaign

 The funding campaign is more than just a means of selling the product.  It is also a way for the manufacturer to introduce his ideas and offer rewards to supporters, as well as providing the means to continue making his ideas a reality.
 However, there is a possibility you could miss out on the rewards.  The product may be returned for a refund within 90-days, but if it is intended as a gift to be given at a specific time, please consider the circumstances when participating in the funding campaign.

 

# Timeline

story:
The RenAn Backpack set was designed for 7 days in Travel, Camping, Driving , Fishing,  Beach and Water sports; Photography; Bicycle, Adventure, Back to school, Go hometown, Survive and Security ,Work etc.   Specially for Couples and Family.

A set of six packs, including travel bag ,tools bag（also usd as Backpack ,Laptop & Tablet Bag ）, first aid bag, toiletry bag(also as food bag/ Carmera bag), shoe bag ,chest pack, laundry bag and TSA approved lock. The whole set also can be used as Bug out Bag. Useful Chest bag is very practical.

The RenAn Backpack set with 62 features that make it the ultimate backpack and Bug Out Bag, with incredible functionality. This beautiful designed backpack is made of strong weather proof material and YKK water proof zipper.

 
 
 
 

The RenAn Backpack set， A set of six packs, including travel bag ,tools bag, first aid bag, toiletry bag(food bag), shoe bag ,chest pack, laundry bag and TSA approved lock.

The tools bag, first aid bag, shoe bag ,chest pack and laundry bag are used independently or in connection with the main body; very convenient and practical.

It’s necessary and helpful for you to have the first aid bag when you Travel, Camping, Driving, Fishing, Adventure, Back to school, Go hometown, Survive and Security ,Boats,RVS,Hiking etc. Emergency time, time is life, extremely fast to do the first aid, thence, We design the removable First aid bag on top of the backpack which is very easy and quick for you to  take and use. 

The first aid bag can be packed with Gauze, medical cotton swabs, tape, bandages, tourniquets, essential medicines including Insect (Bug)Repellent, snake bit kit, anti diarrhea , hemostasia,Ciprofloxacin; Metronidazole ; Cephalexin; Amoxicillin; Erythromycin; Doxycycline; SMZ-TMP; Azitrhomycin; Ampicillin etc.

You can remove and take the First Aid Bag from the backpack when you need it. If you donot need it, You can fixed it in the backpack with strong belt.

 

 

The removable tools bag has much Spaces for all of your gear and carry your everyday carry essentials. This tools bag also can be used as backpack and laptop bag.

The tools bag can carry the car’s Essential items .

 

The backpack can be packed with food, medicine, water and maintenance tools, etc., have them in the car with, safety for you.

 

You can remove and take the tools bag from the backpack when it’s need to use , if you donot need it, You can assemble it in the backpack.

Large and deep side pockets with water proof material to safety fixed your Camera tripod, Badminton racket and self photograph holder，umbrella ,power bank ,fishing items etc. Moreover one more buckle on upper to fix more safety.

 
 

To meet the need water for the human body everyday with 2L, and emergency need for preppers for 72 HOURS survival.

We design these two side pockets in large and deep to load 2L Bottled water. Meanwhile, Two side pockets can carry the Fire extinguisher for car and home survive.

A comfortable handle has been design to help you carry the backpack more enjoyable.


 

A good YKK zipper allow you to easy open the the large main compartment which you can easy access and see the goods.The main compartment can be carry your 7 days clothes including: 7  Shirts, 7  Pair of Pants,7  Pair of Socks,7 Briefs, 1  Sweater,Pair of Shoes,Necktie etc.

To protect your important documents, we design one mesh pocket and zipper pocket Inside main compartment to put You and your family documents: birth certificates,marriage license,wills, bank and credit cart information,insurance policies,phone numbers,family pictures,survival/trap/shelter diagram.Its’ the bang out bag.


The padded and secure laptop and tablet pocket with soft material and elastic band to protect your laptop and tablet, it can hold all series of Macbook and all series of IPAD.

 
 

The socks and underwear mesh pocket are on two side of main compartment, Where you can keep 7 socks and 7 underwears or you can keep your ties etc.

 

The soft,thick and adjustable shoulder strap which provides the comfort and support necessary,and a great fit for all body types. Breathable airmesh back panel promotes ventilation,and comfort.


Elastic buckle to hold the Walkie – talkie and light.

Eventhough you walk at night, You can see with the light the front way.

 

The exterior of RenAn backpack is a durable 100% water proof oxford material.


 

This is Non-general chest pack, the difference is its inner compartment design which is  very convenience and useful for you  to carry your everyday carry essential items, This very practical chest bag which  is made of strong water proof oxford material.


 

The front compartment is designed to carry the money ,bank notes, credit cards,coins and bank U Disk etc. It can carry 9 credit cards.

 

The back compartment is designed to carry every day tools including: tactical pen, Charge head + data cable,power bank,flash light,muti-tools,knife, whistle,cigarette,lighter, notebook, mobile and IPAD etc.

This chest pack is with YKK zipper and TSA approved lock to protect your belongs safety.


 

A separate laundry bag comes with each backpack to complete the set. It can be separately to use or assembled with the backpack.You can keep your dirty clothes separate. Also this laundry bag can be packed with the sleeping bag.


 

The 1.8KG sleeping bag can be put inside the laundry bag .You can carry  backpack together with the sleeping bag when you go to camping,fishing etc.


It's great helpful for you to carry the sleeping bag when you go to camping,fishing,beach etc.
 

A separate shoe bag has been included which you can put inside the bottom of main compartment.  You can take it from the backpack when you need to change the shoe.  This separate shoe bag design can keep your backpack clean.

A TSA approved lock is available with each backpack to protect your belongs safety.

The back compartment is designed to carry every day tools including: tactical pen, Charge head + data cable,power bank,flash light,muti-tools,knife, whistle,cigarette,lighter, notebook, mobile and IPAD etc.






This chest pack is with YKK zipper and TSA approved lock to protect your belongs safety.






 


A separate laundry bag comes with each backpack to complete the set. It can be separately to use or assembled with the backpack.You can keep your dirty clothes separate. Also this laundry bag can be packed with the sleeping bag.



 

The 1.8KG sleeping bag can be put inside the laundry bag .You can carry  backpack together with the sleeping bag when you go to camping,fishing etc.




It's great helpful for you to carry the sleeping bag when you go to camping,fishing,beach etc.

 


A separate shoe bag has been included which you can put inside the bottom of main compartment.  You can take it from the backpack when you need to change the shoe.  This separate shoe bag design can keep your backpack clean.




A TSA approved lock is available with each backpack to protect your belongs safety.

story:
Why Presta?

Presta allows you to rent expensive outdoor gear for low prices from people near you. Outdoor gear is very expensive to buy new (a 4-person tent is $200-$300!), and is often used only a few times a year. The average camper only goes on 1-2 camping trips per year. For many, the high price to get outdoors is a barrier to their participation. Even if you are willing to spend the money, you can either order online from sites like Backcountry, Sierra Trading Post, etc. and wait for days, OR travel to a brick-and-mortar outdoor gear retailer like REI or a local outdoors store (if you have one near you - many people don't). And, since making a purchase means you're stuck with the gear for life, you have to research what you buy. Putting this much time into getting outdoor gear exacerbates the largest barrier to outdoor participation - feeling too busy to get outdoors.

It doesn't have to be this way!

What if you could 'try out' gear or hobbies to see if they're right for you? No pressure to get it perfect on the first try or be out hundreds of dollars.

What if you could get all the gear for your next outdoor adventure in just 5 minutes? No travel required.

What if it was actually cheap? We're talking $10 compared to $200. 

And what if you could do it all right from your phone?

Presta is cheap (and convenient!). With Presta, you can save money on your outdoor adventures, try out a new activity or a piece of equipment before you invest in it, or get outdoors even when you're traveling and don't have your gear with you. We connect you with people in your area who are renting out the gear you need. 

If you already own gear, Presta is a great way for you to earn money without moving a muscle. Say goodbye to buyer's remorse. Instead of letting your equipment sit around collecting dust, list it on Presta and help other people experience the outdoors.

How does Presta work?

Rent outdoor gear for low prices from people near you.

Make money by renting out your gear.

Our Mission

Share the outdoors. Our goal is to make the outdoors cheap, convenient, and more accessible for everyone. We don't want people to think of outdoor recreation as an extreme adventure (although it can be if you want it to!) or something that doesn't fit into their price range and/or lifestyle. With so much gear accessible at your fingertips for extremely affordable prices, we hope to make a weekend bouldering trip as plausible as, say, a trip to the mall. 

Meet The Founders

We've been saying 'we' a whole lot. Well, 'we' are Kevin Delgado and Pallavi Shankar, seniors at Duke University studying computer science, and high school sweethearts originally from Cocoa Beach, FL. We both enjoy climbing, hiking, camping, and are passionate about making outdoor recreation accessible for everyone.

Pallavi studies computer science and biology, and in the summer of 2016 she was a full-stack software engineering intern at Lob, a 25 person, Y-combinator graduate, API start-up that focuses on automating print mail. She honed her skills in web application development and RESTful APIs while developing a grasp of how a startup is run. She brings her technical skills and design expertise to develop the best product and user experience solutions.

Kevin studies electrical & computer engineering and computer science. In the summer of 2016 he was a back-end software engineering intern at LiveRamp, the leading data onboarder, linking online identities for targeted advertising. Previously, he also developed Android applications for use in research in distributed systems. Kevin brings technical skills in building mobile applications and data tools at a massive scale.

How Presta Started

As college students, we're lucky to have an on-campus recreational facility that does cheap, convenient gear rentals. However, not everyone has this, as we learned the hard way last summer in San Francisco.

We wanted to go bouldering outdoors for the first time in Yosemite, but didn't own a crash pad. We had been climbing indoors frequently, but hadn't made the investment to purchase a crash pad. And, since we were only there for the summer, there was no way we could have brought one with us on the plane. No problem, right? San Francisco is the land of Uber, Getaround, Amazon Prime Now; it's all about getting what you need as fast as possible. It also has a thriving outdoors community and three indoor climbing gyms. Yet, none of these places rented out crash pads. Not even REI. At REI, the cashier apologetically told us that if she could, she would let us use hers - it just sat under her bed most of the time...

and the seeds for Presta were planted.

Over the course of the summer, we ran into a few other scenarios where Presta would have been useful. Before a camping trip, we went to REI to buy things we might need at the last minute. A friend wanted to go camping while traveling, but didn't have any gear with her, and renting/buying there was too expensive.

So, we decided to start building Presta, an app for peer-to-peer gear sharing.

What We Need & What You Get

With your help, we want to raise $5000 for social media marketing, Presta swag, and hosting local events to gain publicity and supply. We plan to launch Presta in late March/early April 2017, and run an open beta in the North Carolina Triangle (Raleigh-Durham-Chapel Hill) area. Sign up for our mailing list on our website to receive updates, shoutouts, and be the first to know when we launch.

We are so incredibly grateful for your support!! Every single dollar counts. As a huge thank you for your support, we're giving you some cool perks, including Presta swag and special rewards on the app for being one of our original backers.

  • For $1, you get our undying gratitude and a huge shoutout on our Facebook page.
  • For $10, you get our love, a huge shoutout on our Facebook page, and a handwritten thank-you note from us for your support.
  • For $25, you get all of the above and your first pieces of swag - a Presta sticker and Presta carabiner.
  • For $50, you get our Presta Swag Bag! This includes a drawstring bag, sticker, carabiner, lighter, and t-shirt.
  • For $75, $100, and $250, you get the Presta Silver, Presta Gold, and Presta Platinum pack respectively. All of these get you a Swag Bag and a First Ascent badge on the app to commemorate you as an original Indiegogo backer, and some cool promotion codes.
    • Presta Silver gives you one free delivery.
    • Presta Gold gives you one free delivery and three commission-free rentals (where we won't get any money from your transaction - you keep it all).
    • Presta Platinum gives you all that AND a promoted listing. Your chosen item will show up as a featured item in search results.
  • For $500, first of all, thank you so much for believing in our mission! You get Presta Platinum and a free camping package for two on Presta.
  • For $1000, we just can't express our gratitude without meeting you in real life. You get Presta Platinum and we'd love to treat you to a camping trip with us, the founders.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please like and share us on Facebook and Twitter, and tell your friends about us!

story:
Having a blanket for outdoor activities is crucial. Such a seemingly simple item, but it can make all the difference in the right situation. After countless beach days, camping trips, and picnics in the park we couldn’t find a single blanket that met all of our needs.

Big and fluffy blankets can be great at the park, but if the grass is wet you’re going to get wet. At the beach these blankets fail miserably at repelling sand or staying down on a windy day. They’re also bulky, heavy, and take up way too much room in your bag.

Tarp style blankets can fold up nice and small, but sitting on them is like sitting on a crinkly plastic bag. They’re not comfortable and never stay put no matter what surface you put them on. 

We wanted to make something that can be used for all occasions: Comfortable to sit on, holds tight to the ground, provides a moisture barrier on damp ground, and most of all, packs up into an ultra compact size that can easily fit in your bag without becoming a sloppy mess. 

In order for us to achieve the ideal blanket, we didn't just use one type of material, but rather two. The result is a hybrid blanket packed with unique features that utilizes the strengths of both microfiber and ripstop nylon. We also included some useful additions that we couldn't find on other blankets.

The blanket easily stuffs into its own zippered pouch for quick takedown and effortless storage.  

Each corner has a sand pocket for holding down your blanket on a windy day at the beach.

Four integrated stakes slide out of from sleeves and keep your blanket pinned down in grass or dirt.

The bottom of the blanket has a hidden zipper pocket to protect your valuables and a loop inside to clip your keys.

The bottom of the blanket is made with durable water resistant ripstop nylon providing a moisture barrier when placed on damp surfaces. 

  • Extra large footprint: 57” x 67” (145 cm x 170 cm)
  • Premium soft microfiber material on the top
  • The top can also function as a towel
  • Lightweight ripstop nylon wind/moisture barrier on the bottom
  • Integrated stakes for keeping it secure in grass and dirt
  • Sand pockets in the corners for holding it down at the beach
  • Hidden zipper pocket with key loop / Stuff sack
  • Extra large sunshade hood
  • Folded size: 8.25” x 10.25” x 1.25" (21 cm x 36 cm x 3 cm)
  • Weight: 22oz (623g)
  • Machine wash cold, Do not bleach, Do not tumble dry, Do not iron, Do not dry clean

story:
Hi my name is Diogo Mendonça Ajuz(DiogoWorldRider),

I'm 34 years old, Swiss/Brazilian and I'm always seeking for new adventures. My hobbies are: Sailing, Surfing, Windsurfing, Waterskiing, Wakeboarding, Kneeboarding, Jet-skiing, Mountain-biking, Hiking, Scuba diving, Skiing, Snowboarding, Boxing, Savate and everything with an engine ON and OFF road!

 

 

Recently, I've decided to jump on my motorcycle and ride around the WORLD. I'll start my journey from the beautiful town of Lugano, located in southern Switzerland. From here I will then be crossing through Italy, south of France to Spain where I will take the ferry to north Africa, where the real adventure will begin. Starting in Morocco through the Sahara, Mauritania, Senegal, ect. I will ride down the entire African westcoast, through mud, sand, rocks, poverty and civil wars until I reach South Africa, where the first part of my adventure will be concluded.

 

 

I will be documenting my travels, and keeping a blog that will be featured through a variety of social media websites (i.e. Instagram, Youtube), hoping to create a community through which I will be able to motivate and inspire others to take chances and follow their dreams!

 

 

However in order to make this journey possible, I need some support, your support... so please help me to raise money!

 

 

Thanks everyone!

Diogo Mendonça Ajuz

Diogo Mendonça Ajuz

story:
Bike Racks at Every Shaker Destination

This campaign will provide 25 bike racks at 12 Shaker Heights destinations: strong, elegant inverted 'U' bike racks made by Metro Metal Works, a local firm. And they'll be bright Shaker red!

The campaign can't succeed without your help - in the form of a healthy pledge towards the project. We know all of Shaker Heights will love seeing racks in places that don't offer riders a place to lock up their bicycles. Everyone can help!

This is the kind of project that puts Shaker Heights on the map as a bike friendly community. The campaign also supports one of Bike Shaker's goals: "to provide better and more bike racks in the city of Shaker Heights".

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the nitty gritty:

We need $4,000 for 25 bike racks at 12 locations:
  • Community Building, 2 parking spaces (1 ‘U’ rack)
  • Gridley Park, 4 parking spaces (2 ‘U’ racks)
  • Lower Shaker Lake, 6 parking spaces (3 ‘U’ racks)
  • Launch House, 6 parking spaces (3 ‘U’ racks)
  • Shaker Family Center, 6 parking spaces (3 ‘U’ racks)
  • Hathaway Brown, 4 parking spaces (2 ‘U’ racks)
  • St. Dominic, 6 parking spaces (3 ‘U’ racks)
  • Shaker Historical Society, 4 parking spaces (2 ‘U’ racks)
  • Bicycle Boulevard, 2 parking spaces (1 ‘U’ rack)
  • Hanna Perkins Center, 2 parking spaces (1 ‘U’ rack)
  • Shaker Heights Youth Center, 4 parking spaces (2 ‘U’ racks)
  • Shaker Plaza (Cleveland Running), 4 parking spaces (2 'U' racks)

Please visit the 'Bike Friendly' Shaker Heights Google Map to see all of these locations. Destinations that need bicycle parking have a red marker. Destinations with bike parking are marked with a blue 'P'.

Contribute and you'll be invited to a 'lock up' party at the end of the campaign at the Shaker Historical Society.

In the event we don't make the entire $4,000, we will purchase as many bike racks as we can with funds raised. We'll prioritize the rack placement based on use.

But if we we make more than our $4,000 goal, we can install more racks in each location or at other locations! So a location that is planning on receiving a single rack could see two, etc.

A unique feature of this campaign is that it allows you to support two good causes - biking and Metro Metal Works - with a single contribution.  Metro Metal Works is a non-profit organization that "designs, manufactures, sells and installs bicycle racks while training individuals from an under-utilized workforce, resulting in their employment and self-sufficiency." It was recently featured in the Plain Dealer.

Your contribution will be made to the Shaker Historical Society; Bike Shaker is a Society committee which is managing the purchase and installation of the bike racks.

Safe and Secure Lockups for All Riders

Shaker Heights is pursuing recognition as a 'Bicycle Friendly Community' with the League of American Bicyclists (LAB). LAB states in its recommendations for the city: 

"Increase the amount of high quality bicycle parking at popular destinations throughout the community. Residents of multi-family dwellings should have access to high quality bike parking as well. Regulations that require bike parking, e.g. for new developments, can secure private funding. See the bicycle parking ordinances of Madison, Wisconsin and Santa Cruz, California. Also consider adding some artistic bike racks to enhance the sense of place of your community."

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to this campaign, but would still like to help:

  • Volunteer to help with Bike Shaker initiatives like Bike to School Week happening in May. Find out about other opportunities on the Bike Shaker Facebook page.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools and get as many Shaker Heights residents as you can here!

story:
The Adventure Islands is Westport's Premier Adventure Company. We have two superb locations for our land and water activities. Our land base is located in the town center on 480 acres on the grounds of the famous Westport House Estate. Our exclusive private Island is the home of our water activities only a 10 minute drive from the town. 

 We offer 25 different adventure activities suitable from 6 years and up, we have something for everyone.

The following is just a taster of the array of activities we have; Archery, Combat Games, Sky Challenge - Climb, Zip & Jump, Laser Clay Pigeon Shooting, Sea Kayaking, Dinghy Sailing, Snorkeling, Sea Trampoline and lots more.

Check us out on Facebook, TripAdvisor and on our Website to find out more about us.


What We Need & What You Get

  • We Need 20k to buy a number of extra elements for the Sea Water Park, we already have Ireland largest Water Trampolines. We want to include additional capacity with inflatable climbers, giant slides, Bouncers, Flippers, Ice Tower, Spinners along with wet-area chillers for chilling out and having the best fun ever! Check out our Trip Advisor page, The Adventure Islands to see what people say about our Water Trampolines we have already. 

  • WHAT YOU GET: (Vouchers can be used on any TAI Adventure Activity) 

    €100  receive vouchers worth €200 for any TAI activity within 2014 season

    €500  receive €1000 in vouchers for any activity with TAI over 2014/2015 season 

    €1000  receive your €1000 back end of 2015 season and TAI vouchers worth €500 over 2014/2015

  • All funds go onto the Sea-Water park only, to create West of Ireland's only Sea -Water Park. Next year we also plan to put in Ireland only Zip line over water, from one side of the Island to the other. We also plan to build Ireland's longest water slide from the top of the Island into our safe and sheltered bay. 

The Impact

We are ambitious. We have always dreamed of creating, and to date we have! Irelands best Sea-Water park right in the beautiful surrounds of Clew Bay is the next Dream, lets make it come through. There is so much open space and activities to partake in and adding the Sea-Water park on our Private Island it will be the icing on the cake for the local tourism industry and for all the visitors we welcome from all corners of the globe. It will be a Destination thing in Clew Bay and Westport. 

  • We have been hugely successful over the last three years where we have built one of the best and fastest growing Adventure Companies in Ireland. We are now Westport and Mayo's Premier Adventure company. We are very proud to say we are also debt free, fully tax compliant and approved by the Irish Revenue Investment Scheme (EII) and have a huge commitment to safety and to the environment we operate in and around. 
  • We encourage anyone to check out our TripAdvisor page for testimonials or ask us for our impeccable trade references or come visit us and see for yourself who we are and how our operation works.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant help with funding maybe there are others ways you can help us: 

  • We have 7100 likes on our Facebook page maybe you could help spread the word and help us reach our goal of 10,000 likes, we will invite you to the party! 
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word also. 

Thanks So Much - Cant Wait To See You All on our private Island in Westport, County Mayo
story_txt:
The
Adventure Islands is Westport's Premier Adventure Company. We have two superb locations for our land and water activities. Our land base is located in the town center on 480 acres on the grounds of the famous Westport House Estate. Our exclusive private Island is the home of our water activities only a 10 minute drive from the town. 
 We offer 25 different adventure activities suitable from 6 years and up, we have something for everyone.
The following is just a taster of the array of activities we have; Archery, Combat Games, Sky Challenge - Climb, Zip & Jump, Laser Clay Pigeon Shooting, Sea Kayaking, Dinghy Sailing, Snorkeling, Sea Trampoline and lots more.
Check us out on Facebook, TripAdvisor and on our Website to find out more about us.

story:
When we embarked on creating The Airhook 2.0 the biggest focus was testing! Details of our testing is noted below and we will continue to add content throughout our campaign. We've also included links to folders with dozens more images per airline. 

  • Alaska: https://bit.ly/2JEAn2W 
  • American: https://bit.ly/2HIgjfq 
  • Delta: https://bit.ly/2HIhDz4 
  • Frontier: https://bit.ly/2Fy4nva 
  • Southwest: https://bit.ly/2HIgk2Y 
  • United: https://bit.ly/2r9VZgG 
  • Virgin: https://bit.ly/2rdeFfJ

Next, we classified the tray table types and will include instructions on the final packaging to make install a breeze! If you are familiar with an airline not included above and recognize their tray table type, please let us know :D 

Our team tested the Crossbar in dozens of vehicles too! The ONLY headrest's The Crossbar did not fit on, was when the headrest itself was not height adjustable. Additional photos can be found here: https://bit.ly/2I5fnoS.

 

And last, lots of luggage! Additional photos can be found here: https://bit.ly/2jlfTBg. 

 

On January 7th, 2016, I [Craig Rabin, Inventor of The Airhook] lost my mother after a 33 month battle with cancer. Unfortunately, everyone seems to have a family member, friend, or colleague that is affected by cancer.

The good news, is that due to advances in technology, medicine, and detection methods, more people are fighting and beating cancer! The number of people living beyond a cancer diagnosis reached nearly 14.5 million in 2014 and is expected to rise to almost 19 million by 2024. We want to see this continue!

So in light of this event, we've made a team decision to donate a percentage of the proceeds from every Airhook sale to cancer research. We've done this from the sale of the very first Airhook in 2015 and have been blessed to have raised thousands in donations over the last couple years. 

Let's beat cancer together! Thank you!

**Last Updated February 15, 2019 **

 

Thanks again for your interest in The Airhook! We'd love to hear from you. Please feel free to send us a note on Kickstarter, post on the campaign page itself, or e-mail us at we@theairhook.com.

Have a wonderful rest of your day!

 

Risks and challenges

We have waited until now to launch The Airhook 2.0 & The Crossbar to remove as much risk and uncertainty as possible. Our biggest priority is ensuring on-time delivery and a high quality product. However, as we finalize the development and initial shipment delivery, there are some potential challenges related to manufacturing and logistics.

• There may be slight changes to the final design dimensions & specifications of some of The Airhook 2.0 & Crossbar components as we optimize the design for manufacturing and mass production – these changes will not impact performance in any way. 
• There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our supporters may be delayed due to unforeseen product changes that require additional development or addition to the scope of our manufacturing timeline. 
• There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our supporters may be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances in international shipping and customs logistics.

If there are any changes to our plan and throughout the process, we will communicate updates and should anything change, update our supporters in a timely manner.

story:
A Next-Gen Sling Bag

The Alpha Sling came to fruition after listening to our previous backers' requests for a larger sling bag capable of safely carrying tablets.

Tablets are quickly becoming powerful work tools and are replacing laptops in many ways. This is why the Alpha Sling was engineered to unchain you from your work desk and give you the freedom to work and play from anywhere. 

 

Meet the Alpha Sling: A slim everyday bag that can hold your tablet and more...much more. We have crafted a bag capable of adapting to modern life. It uses a magnetic Fidlock buckle (best in the world), a lockable flap which allows you to lock the bag for extra security against pickpockets, a buckle on the strap to quickly remove the bag, and waterproof backing to keep all your tech gear safe and dry. Aesthetically designed and extremely functional.  

ALPHA SLING DEMO

We never compromise on the parts and materials we use. It's in our DNA to strive for the best.

Our bags are crossover everyday and travel bags. You'll find loads of convenient travel features in all of our products. The Alpha Sling is no exception.

 

It also comes with anti-theft features made to keep your valuables and important documents safe from prying eyes.

 

UP Cardholder

Whether it's implementing water-saving manufacturing practices or reducing toxic waste by-product, we always strive to make our products as sustainable as possible.

The Up Cardholder is a 100% zero waste cardholder that is made entirely from up-cycled materials. We used the by-product materials (that would normally be discarded) from our bags to create a new product: Up Cardholder - a slim, sustainable and functional cardholder with RFID protection.

 

It comes with 3 compartments. The main compartment is lined with RFID blocking materials to prevent thieves from stealing your personal information. The main compartment also contains an integrated pull tab for quick and easy retrieval of your cards.

Slim. Sustainable. Functional.

 

As a way of saying thanks for helping us bring the Alpha Sling to life, we give you, our backers, the biggest discounts we'll ever have for the Alpha Sling and any other crowdfunded products. Thank you for being part of the journey.

 

 

Please Share This Project

Know someone who will love this project?

Let them know about it by clicking on the buttons below:

 

ALPHA SLING ARTICLES

 

 

WE ARE ALPAKA

We have a true passion for style, sustainability, and function. We believe combining all of these things can improve the way we live.

It's been almost 3 years since we launched our first crowdfunding campaign. This would have never been possible without the support of our backers and this is only the beginning.

Our foundation is bags. But we're not stopping there. Our mission is to create highly functional products that are durable and great looking.

ALPAKA products are meant to be used every day but are also packed with convenient travel features, blurring the line between everyday and travel.

Thank you for being part of the journey.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We've launched six crowdfunding campaigns in under 3 years. The real challenge starts after the campaign ends and the funds are released. We know that with our experience we will be able to produce the bag and have it shipped to backers by September – 2019. We have the full support of the manufacturer and fulfilment has already been planned.

Even though we do not see any direct risks, there are always unforeseen circumstances that may present themselves during production and fulfilment. If this were to occur, we will always be 100% transparent with you and communicate this to you right away. As with all of our previous campaigns, our goal is to design, produce and deliver an awesome, high-quality bag you are excited about, and we will do everything we possibly can to make that happen.

story:
Cyber Blade, the Perfect Futuristic EDC Knife

The Cyber Blade is the perfect EDC knife for you. It’s compact, futuristic, and built-to-last.

Designed by Yue Dong, Manufactured by Kizer.

Overview：Compact and Futuristic, Cyber Blade is a purposefully designed, meticulously engineered, remarkably tough, perfectly compact pocketknife that built with the best materials and technologies. Let us introduce you to the Cyber Blade, the perfect EDC companion for your daily tasks and every occasion!

 

The Cyber Blade:

From the Acheulean stone knives to the modern folding knives, from the Japanese Kiridashi to the Swiss army knife, knife has always been the most used and trusted every-day-carry tools in the 2.6 million year of human civilization.

 

We understand the importance of having a knife --- opening packages, preparing foods, shaving woods, cutting seatbelts, removing splinter, stripping wires, all these tasks require a trustworthy knife. However, since we often carry electronic gadgets in our pocket, we want our knife to space-efficient, light weight, and office friendly. The Cyber Blade is exactly designed based on aforementioned factors so that you can always have it by your side.

 

As you may tell, the design of the Cyber Blade is inspired by Tesla’s Cyber Truck. We want to create something fun for you, and you can be sure that it will be conversation starter for you. We ditched curves in favor of bold and sharp edges to create this most unique and futuristic gear to meet your everyday carry needs. While the Cyber Blade is small and light enough that you will hardly notice it’s in your pocket, it packs a powerful punch and is tough enough that you can reliable on it when you need it the most.

 

The Cyber Blade is the perfect gears for your daily tasks. With its CPM-S35VN steel® blade and Ti-6Al-4V titanium alloy handle, it provides the ultimate cutting performance, superior corrosion resistance, and unbelievable durability. With its user replaceable glass breaker backspacer and angular tanto blade, you can rely on it even in the most critical emergency situation

 

Features

The Design

We make this slick, compact, durable, functional, and futuristic knife to show our love for technology and geek culture. Just holding the Cyber Blade, you will be amazed by its unique geometric and industrial design as well as the impeccable craftsmanship. Once you open it, the Cyber Blade will remarkably resemble the silhouette of Tesla’s latest Cyber truck.

 

The lines on the Thumb stud, the lines and sections of the titanium frame and the Weight-reducing hollowed out inside the handle are all milled by the CNC machine.

 

The Steel

Steel is the foundation of a knife. The Cyber Blade is made of Crucible’s CPM-S35VN steel®, a well-tested and trusted martensitic supersteel made from the and powder metallurgical process. This easy-to-maintain supersteel has excellent edge retention (Carbon, 1.4%,), superior corrosion resistance (Chromium, 14%; Molybdenum, 2%), exceptional toughness (Niobium, 0.5%), and remarkable wear resistance (Vanadium, 3%). You can be sure that your Cyber Blade will not only be razor sharp right out of the box, but also it will razor stay sharp for an extremely long time.

 

The Blade Shape

We start with this question; how we can combine the aesthetics and functionality of traditional Japanese tanto knife with present-day artistic presentation and modern technologies. To answer this question, our design team obsessively researched historical knife making documents and used up-to-date software such as Solidworks and AutoCAD in the designing process. The Cyber Blade uses a purposefully designed modified tantō as its blade shape. This unique shape utilizes the reinforced tip (kissaki) to provide superior strength and durability for carving and piercing; the straight line at the front of the blade also allows you to do scraping related work; the second angular point (yokote) between the front and lower blade section let you cut through things such as cables and boxes with ease; combined with the flat blade line, the Cyber Blade is perfect both daily tasks such slicing and cutting foods as well as emergency situation such as cutting seatbelts.

 

The Handle

The Cyber Blade is specifically crafted to endure the harshest environment and most challenge mission, that’s why we use Ti-6Al-4V titanium alloy as its handle material. This titanium alloy has one of the best strength-to-weight ratios among all metals. On top of this, it has incredible heat and corrosion resistance. Because of these extraordinary metallurgic properties, it is a preferred material in aerospace, deep-water maritime, and surgical applications. To utilize the full potential of this titanium alloy, our engineering team using the state-of-the-art machineries to precisely manufacture the handle. We meticulously machined the exterior to create two minimalistic planar and carefully milled out the interior to further reduce the weight. In addition, we precisely CNC machined jimping in the internal area on the top of the knife handle to provide you extra control and grip strength in maritime environment.

 

The Mechanism

The Cyber Blade uses a dual-opening mechanism. A user replaceable thumb disk is located on the spine of the blade, which allow you to open the knife even when you are wearing gloves. If you don’t like the thumb disk, you can also use the window-shaped thumb hole to open the knife, and it is ambidextrous (southpaws friendly, yeah!). Both opening mechanisms is intuitive and easy to access. To create a strong and easy-to-use safe lock, the Cyber Blade utilizes the frame lock mechanism. On the Cyber Blade, a part of the Ti-6Al-4V titanium handle is machined to be the frame lock. The use of frame lock satisfies both aesthetics and safety. Because of the high mechanical strength and the intrinsic flexibility of the Ti-6Al-4V titanium, this lock is extremely strong and safe. In addition, the inner tip of the 3D pocket clip also functions as over-travel-stop for the frame lock to prevent metal fatigue. Furthermore, to prevent wear down on the titanium frame, we added a harden steel insert in the contact area between the frame and the blade. All these details ensure that your Cyber Blade is not only easy-to-use, but also extremely durable and safe.

 

The Hardware:

To deliver the best knife to you, we looked at each and every detail. To achieve exceptional smoothness of the open and close actions, we use industry leading ceramic ball bearing system; and our experienced craftsmen hand-tuned the Cyber Blade to ensure quality. For corrosion resistance and durability, we make custom 418 hardened stainless-steel screw sets for the Cyber Blade. For easy carry and aesthetics, we 3D machined Ti-6Al-4V titanium to make a calcite shaped pocket clip with the great retention. Furthermore, we provide two different backspacers for you to install on the Cyber Blade. The red one is made from high-pressure laminated G10 fiberglass, the sharp color contrast just like a taillight; while the stainless steel backspacer is equipped with a tungsten glass breaker tip for emergency situation.

 

Specs:

Blade Length: 1.89” (48mm)

Opened Length: 5.6” (144mm, with glass breaker), 5.5” (141 mm, w/o glass breaker)

Closed Length:   3.38” (86mm)

Overall Thickness: 0.6” (15mm, with pocket clip), 0.5” (12.5 mm, w/o pocket clip)

Blade Thickness: 1/7” (3.5mm)

Weight: 3.5oz (100g)

 

Handle Material: TC4 Titanium

Blade Steel: CPM-S35VN

Titanium Pocket Clip

Hardened Stainless Steel Screws

Ceramic Ball Bearing

Frame-lock

Pocket Clip

Tungsten Glass breaker

Limited Lifetime Warranty Provided by Kizer

Both opening mechanisms is intuitive and easy to access. To create a strong and easy-to-use safe lock, the Cyber Blade utilizes the frame lock mechanism. On the Cyber Blade, a part of the Ti-6Al-4V titanium handle is machined to be the frame lock. The use of frame lock satisfies both aesthetics and safety. Because of the high mechanical strength and the intrinsic flexibility of the Ti-6Al-4V titanium, this lock is extremely strong and safe. In addition, the inner tip of the 3D pocket clip also functions as over-travel-stop for the frame lock to prevent metal fatigue. Furthermore, to prevent wear down on the titanium frame, we added a harden steel insert in the contact area between the frame and the blade. All these details ensure that your Cyber Blade is not only easy-to-use, but also extremely durable and safe.  The Hardware:To deliver the best knife to you, we looked at each and every detail. To achieve exceptional smoothness of the open and close actions, we use industry leading ceramic ball bearing system; and our experienced craftsmen hand-tuned the Cyber Blade to ensure quality. For corrosion resistance and durability, we make custom 418 hardened stainless-steel screw sets for the Cyber Blade. For easy carry and aesthetics, we 3D machined Ti-6Al-4V titanium to make a calcite shaped pocket clip with the great retention. Furthermore, we provide two different backspacers for you to install on the Cyber Blade. The red one is made from high-pressure laminated G10 fiberglass, the sharp color contrast just like a taillight; while the stainless steel backspacer is equipped with a tungsten glass breaker tip for emergency situation. Specs:  Blade Length: 1.89” (48mm)Opened Length: 5.6” (144mm, with glass breaker), 5.5” (141 mm, w/o glass breaker)Closed Length:   3.38” (86mm)Overall Thickness: 0.6” (15mm, with pocket clip), 0.5” (12.5 mm, w/o pocket clip)Blade Thickness: 1/7” (3.5mm)Weight: 3.5oz (100g) Handle Material: TC4 TitaniumBlade Steel: CPM-S35VNTitanium Pocket ClipHardened Stainless Steel ScrewsCeramic Ball BearingFrame-lockPocket ClipTungsten Glass breakerLimited Lifetime Warranty Provided by Kizer

story:
Powerful Legs

The beautiful design is not only aesthetic driven but it is also reliable, efficient, and practical. Its been tested over 10,000 times, supports up-to 355 pounds, and most importantly - the base is 100% maintenance free.

Memory Presets

Engineered with 4-easy to use preset keys, simply find your sitting and standing height. Then, click M (memorize) and a Preset Key (1, 2, 3, 4). In-less than one minute, your desk is ergonomically sized and ready to go.

MousePad

Install a super thick and heavy-duty mousepad that sits flush against the surface.

Display Docks

This smart feature displays your phone and tablet for clear viewing. Plus, charge your devices without any visible cables.

Drink Holder

Protect your laptop and other devices from surface spills with a recessed drink holder. 

Storage Trays

Use this area to neatly store your keys, pens, coins and other items.

Cable Management

Keep your cables hidden and organized beneath your desk.

Premium Material

Built from pure, premium bamboo because of its strength, beauty, and durability. Plus, it's an earth friendly, renewable resource.

Health Benefits

Like most the world, we spend the majority of our days sitting. From work, to lunch, to our daily commute - we are constantly sitting. By the time we arrive home from work, we’re mentally and physically drained, our head aches, our back is killing us, and we are in no mood to visit the gym.

All this sitting in our lives made us think. We started wondering if the claims were true…? How does sitting all day affect our health? Well, we did some research and what we discovered was quite shocking.




We were immediately frightened. More so, we were ready to put a stop to our bad back, head stress, and just - being tired all the time. In response, we spent the next several months creating, what we believe - is the best and most affordable product on the market to cure sitting disease. We happily introduce the LIFT Pro and hope it will improve your posture, mind, productivity, and health as it has for the team members at iSkelter.



Our Guarantee
Between IndieGogo and Kickstarter, iSkelter has successfully funded 12 products totaling $435,019 and 4,644 backers. Most importantly, we hold a 92% on-time fulfillment grade and continue to keep a 5-star post project rating on Amazon.



Why We Need Your Help 

It's time to make LIFT PRO a retail product for everyone to enjoy. With your help, we will be able to purchase the materials and implement a streamlined production method. The entire production process will be completed in the USA at the iSkelter factory in Phoenix, Arizona.

Shipping and Delivery Time: Your LIFT PRO will be shipped for Free within the Domestic USA and World-Wide for an additional fee depending on your location. 

To ensure correct delivery times - once our goal has been met, we will begin ordering material and start the initial production run. iSkelter's fulfillment center guarantee's 3 to 5 day shipping for both domestic and international shipments. For any immediate questions, please contact us at support@iskelter.com.
