story:
Let's face it, Johnny's competition isn't up to much. Most coolers aren't exactly pretty to look at and can't manage much more than keeping a few drinks cool, if that. Johnny Cool is so much more.

Hot summer days and nights with friends just got cooler. From backyard to beach, lake to tailgate, camping to crazy festivals...Johnny brings the party anywhere. 

Your next hang-out is about to become an unforgettable summer moment. Chill out with friends on the beach, blending delicious cocktails or playing the freshest summer tunes. Johnny’s got it covered. He runs on renewable energy and can party as long as you.

Johnny keeps things chill while you enjoy the warm outdoors. He’s perfect on tranquil breaks, too. Johnny can follow you across any terrain and carry the load. All that’s left to do is hang out with the people you love and find that perfect spot to unwind. 

Fire up the grill while Johnny cracks open the beers. He’s got the picnic table and settings sorted, too. Johnny Cool has thought of everything and is sustainable and organic. While you’re getting the fun started, let him charge your camera for that first group shot to kick off the season. 

Say cheese! It’s so good to have everyone together again. This time Johnny’s along to make it even better. It’s going to be the best summer ever :)







You bring that special touch to any party. Favorite foods, the freshest cocktail ingredients, games to play on the beach and the ultimate summer track list. Johnny is your buddy and he’s taken care of everything else. 

“If only we’d remembered to bring…” There’s no more of that. Johnny’s thought of everything and it’s all in one place, neatly packed, lightweight and ready to go. There’s no hassle or endless to-do lists in planning a day out anymore.

Johnny’s been designed with love and it shows. He cares about you and the planet. He lasts a lifetime and is made from sustainable and organic material. 

Keep your buddy by your side so you can concentrate on the important things. Fun, friends, family and perfect days out in the sun.




Warm sand, cold beers, Bluetooth sound system and the most chilled beach parties :)

By the water, in the woods, Johnny Cool is all-terrain and perfect for relaxed times away.

Blender, ice, fresh fruit and a spontaneous cocktail hour on the roof, watching the sun set over the city ;)

From the fishing line to the ice box to the grill, Johnny Cool kept our campfire feast super fresh...and we didn't have to carry a thing. 

So relaxed...Johnny Cool's solar panel soaked up the sun with us. Let the summer playlist play on... 






Johnny Cool is made from strong, smart and light material including organic and recycled plastic, aluminium and stainless steel.

SPEC

W:    60 cm   /   23,62 inches   

H:     45 cm   /   17,71 inches   

L:      45 cm   /   17,71 inches 

CAPACITY

min 55 liters   /   58,11 quarts

WEIGHT

10 kg   /   22,04 lbs

BATTERY

20V Lithium-ion battery

ALL-TERRAIN TIRES   

Pristine beaches, off-road woodland or muddy festivals, Johnny Cool is effortless, wherever you go. His wheels are rubber-coated aluminium and are equipped with ball bearings, so they’re strong, light and have grip. He glides on smooth surfaces, is excellent across all terrain and skates over sand, thanks to his clever sled design. 

Wheels measure 7,72 cm / 3 inches (W) by  22,86 cm / 9 inches (H)





Outstanding quality and design, environmentally friendly and guaranteed. 





Johnny Cool is built to last a lifetime and has the same exceptional quality and durability as all our products. We’re so confident in Johnny we’ll offer you a lifetime guarantee. 





Maybe Johnny Cool can’t save the world but he can make it a little kinder. Johnny Cool is about cool design and quality that is sustainable and has a low carbon footprint. He is made from recycled material and organic plastic. 









Johnny Cool comes in range of Cool colors and is available exclusively at INDIEGOGO.




Want to sell me in your store? Awesome! Just send me an Email!




Download the Presskit







We’re a driven, young start-up based in Hamburg, Germany, committed to creating fun and practical lifestyle innovation.

Our team consists of highly qualified experts from a variety of fields to bring you the highest standards across combined technology, function and design.

We’re committed to environmentally and ecologically friendly materials and design across production.




Johnny Cool’s final prototype is finished and in production. This Prototype is similar to the series products. 

Our carefully selected partners in manufacturing, production and sourcing are poised and raring to produce our first order. They’re the best at what they do and commit the same level of care, quality and attention to detail as we do to ensure each Johnny Cool going out to you is as tip top as the last. They can scale production, too. 

We’ve honed every last detail and everything is ready for our next big step. That’s where you come in. With your support, we’ll finance our first order and have the opportunity to introduce you to Johnny Cool!





We’ve spent more than a year putting work and expertise into making Johnny Cool’s production smart and organized. The next steps are carefully planned and we have taken extensive measures to ensure risk is mitigated. We work with leading partners and consultants to make sure Johnny Cool’s production is as smooth as he is. 

Manufacturing:

Johnny Cool is special and requires special tooling, which takes a little time and money. It’s possible, though unlikely, that complications delay the manufacturing schedule. That’s why we’ve selected the best partners who bring experience and expertise to every step of producing Johnny Cool.




How do I select Johnny’s color?

We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign where you can select your color. If you’ve purchased more than one Johnny, you can select multiple colors.


When will I receive Johnny?

Delivery starts in September.


How can I charge Johnny’s battery?

You can charge him via standard wall outlet, his solar panel or with your car’s cigarette lighter socket. Johnny’s charger is compatible with power outlets worldwide and many different adapters. 


Does Johnny need to be plugged in to stay cool?

Nope! Johnny is a passive cooling box and only requires ice or freezer blocks.


How long can Johnny stay cool?

Johnny is perfectly insulated and can stay cold for up to 48 hours. 


Do I have to use the shade?

No, it’s entirely up to you. Of course, by using it, you’ll increase Johnny’s efficiency and he’ll stay cooler longer.


What’s the capacity of Johnny’s blender?

1.5 liters. The jug is made of plastic.


How much of Johnny is organic plastic?

Johnny’s plates and cups are 100% organic plastic.


What are the benefits of organic plastic?

Organic plastic is uniquely sustainable, manufactured entirely from renewable raw materials. It is entirely non-toxic and has a favorable CO2 balance. 


Are the plates and the cups dishwasher proof?

YES !


What spec is Johnny’s speaker?

Johnny’s speaker produces a big sound with deep bass, providing a high-quality, full-range listening experience.

Wireless range up to 10 m/30 ft

Battery life up to 10 hrs

Power rating: 100 - 240V 


What features are included in Johnny Cool FULL?

Johnny Cool FULL has everything: 

All-terrain tires, 20V  Lithium-ion battery, battery charger, rechargeable 2-Speed blender, Bluetooth speaker, bottle opener, cup holder, four organic cups, divider & chopping board,  fruit knife, LED lights, locker, luggage ties, four organic plates, picnic table, pocket, shade, solar panel, two USB chargers, USB flashlight.


What features are included in Johnny Cool LITE?

Johnny Cool FULL, without the rechargeable 2-Speed blender and solar panel: 

All-terrain tires, 20V  Lithium-ion battery, battery charger, Bluetooth speaker, bottle opener, cup holder, four organic cups, divider & chopping board,  fruit knife, LED lights, locker, luggage ties, four organic plates, picnic table, pocket, shade, two USB chargers, USB flashlight.

You bring that special touch to any party. Favorite foods, the freshest cocktail ingredients, games to play on the beach and the ultimate summer track list. Johnny is your buddy and he’s taken care of everything else. 
“If only we’d remembered to bring…” There’s no more of that. Johnny’s thought of everything and it’s all in one place, neatly packed, lightweight and ready to go. There’s no hassle or endless to-do lists in planning a day out anymore.
Johnny’s been designed with love and it shows. He cares about you and the planet. He lasts a lifetime and is made from sustainable and organic material. 
Keep your buddy by your side so you can concentrate on the important things. Fun, friends, family and perfect days out in the sun.



Warm sand, cold beers, Bluetooth sound system and the most chilled beach parties :)

By the water, in the woods, Johnny Cool is all-terrain and perfect for relaxed times away.

Blender, ice, fresh fruit and a spontaneous cocktail hour on the roof, watching the sun set over the city ;)

From the fishing line to the ice box to the grill, Johnny Cool kept our campfire feast super fresh...and we didn't have to carry a thing. 

So relaxed...Johnny Cool's solar panel soaked up the sun with us. Let the summer playlist play on... 


Johnny Cool is made from strong, smart and light material including organic and recycled plastic, aluminium and stainless steel.

SPEC

W:    60 cm   /   23,62 inches   

H:     45 cm   /   17,71 inches   

L:      45 cm   /   17,71 inches 


CAPACITY

min 55 liters   /   58,11 quarts


WEIGHT

10 kg   /   22,04 lbs

BATTERY

20V Lithium-ion battery



ALL-TERRAIN TIRES   
Pristine beaches, off-road woodland or muddy festivals, Johnny Cool is effortless, wherever you go. His wheels are rubber-coated aluminium and are equipped with ball bearings, so they’re strong, light and have grip. He glides on smooth surfaces, is excellent across all terrain and skates over sand, thanks to his clever sled design. 
Wheels measure 7,72 cm / 3 inches (W) by  22,86 cm / 9 inches (H)






Outstanding quality and design, environmentally friendly and guaranteed. 











Johnny Cool is built to last a lifetime and has the same exceptional quality and durability as all our products. We’re so confident in Johnny we’ll offer you a lifetime guarantee. 









Maybe Johnny Cool can’t save the world but he can make it a little kinder. Johnny Cool is about cool design and quality that is sustainable and has a low carbon footprint. He is made from recycled material and organic plastic. 




Johnny Cool comes in range of Cool colors and is available exclusively at INDIEGOGO.











Want to sell me in your store? Awesome! Just send me an Email! 






Download the Presskit











We’re a driven, young start-up based in Hamburg, Germany, committed to creating fun and practical lifestyle innovation.
Our team consists of highly qualified experts from a variety of fields to bring you the highest standards across combined technology, function and design.
We’re committed to environmentally and ecologically friendly materials and design across production.











Johnny Cool’s final prototype is finished and in production. This Prototype is similar to the series products. 


Our carefully selected partners in manufacturing, production and sourcing are poised and raring to produce our first order. They’re the best at what they do and commit the same level of care, quality and attention to detail as we do to ensure each Johnny Cool going out to you is as tip top as the last. They can scale production, too. 


We’ve honed every last detail and everything is ready for our next big step. That’s where you come in. With your support, we’ll finance our first order and have the opportunity to introduce you to Johnny Cool!










We’ve spent more than a year putting work and expertise into making Johnny Cool’s production smart and organized. The next steps are carefully planned and we have taken extensive measures to ensure risk is mitigated. We work with leading partners and consultants to make sure Johnny Cool’s production is as smooth as he is. 
Manufacturing:
Johnny Cool is special and requires special tooling, which takes a little time and money. It’s possible, though unlikely, that complications delay the manufacturing schedule. That’s why we’ve selected the best partners who bring experience and expertise to every step of producing Johnny Cool.







How do I select Johnny’s color?


We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign where you can select your color. If you’ve purchased more than one Johnny, you can select multiple colors.

When will I receive Johnny?



Delivery starts in September.

How can I charge Johnny’s battery?


You can charge him via standard wall outlet, his solar panel or with your car’s cigarette lighter socket. Johnny’s charger is compatible with power outlets worldwide and many different adapters. 

Does Johnny need to be plugged in to stay cool?


Nope! Johnny is a passive cooling box and only requires ice or freezer blocks.

How long can Johnny stay cool?


Johnny is perfectly insulated and can stay cold for up to 48 hours. 

Do I have to use the shade?


No, it’s entirely up to you. Of course, by using it, you’ll increase Johnny’s efficiency and he’ll stay cooler longer.

What’s the capacity of Johnny’s blender?
1.5 liters. The jug is made of plastic.

How much of Johnny is organic plastic?


Johnny’s plates and cups are 100% organic plastic.

What are the benefits of organic plastic?




Organic plastic is uniquely sustainable, manufactured entirely from renewable raw materials. It is entirely non-toxic and has a favorable CO2 balance. 





Are the plates and the cups dishwasher proof?
YES !

What spec is Johnny’s speaker?


Johnny’s speaker produces a big sound with deep bass, providing a high-quality, full-range listening experience.


Wireless range up to 10 m/30 ft
Battery life up to 10 hrs
Power rating: 100 - 240V 







What features are included in Johnny Cool FULL?
Johnny Cool FULL has everything: 
All-terrain tires, 20V  Lithium-ion battery, battery charger, rechargeable 2-Speed blender, Bluetooth speaker, bottle opener, cup holder, four organic cups, divider & chopping board,  fruit knife, LED lights, locker, luggage ties, four organic plates, picnic table, pocket, shade, solar panel, two USB chargers, USB flashlight.





What features are included in Johnny Cool LITE?
Johnny Cool FULL, without the rechargeable 2-Speed blender and solar panel: 
All-terrain tires, 20V  Lithium-ion battery, battery charger, Bluetooth speaker, bottle opener, cup holder, four organic cups, divider & chopping board,  fruit knife, LED lights, locker, luggage ties, four organic plates, picnic table, pocket, shade, two USB chargers, USB flashlight.

story:
Backpackers with a Passion for Better Food.

It's out there. We've found the best vendors out there you haven't seen. Now we want to share.

We have been going on new adventures, eating the same old trail food your dad ate and decided enough is enough, so we have scoured the market for smaller vendors that aren't widely distributed. There's a lot of exciting food out there, guys! We have been thrilled with what our digging has produced, so we are working to aggregate the best of the best and send it to you in a convenient monthly subscription. 

The groundwork is laid and our overhead is low! We don't need you to fund our operation! Just pay for your food for a fraction of the cost, time and trouble it would take you to source yourself. 

Dehydrated Meals

Whether it be the oatmeal that you begin your day with, or the rewarding bounty that you eat after a long day, dehydrated meals are without a doubt one of the most substantial, rewarding ways to feed yourself on the trail. That said, they conjure images of some of the same standard, under-seasoned, boring flavor profiles that have become the norm over the years.

We wanted more, so we started looking. What we found was astounding. We have found an abundance of dehydrated food companies that are making exciting new recipes every day. Need a vegan, gluten-free, or paleo option? Check. Want to trade your beans and rice, lasagna, or chicken out for an exciting curry or stew? No problem. We’ve done the footwork, and we want to show you what we’ve found.

Artisan Bars

Fuel. Energy. Juice. Bars are one of the most convenient ways to fuel yourself during your hike, climb, kayak, or other adventure. They are also one of the most diverse groups of trail snacks that you can imagine. How many have you tried? We want to help you find the perfect fit for your taste, diet, and ethics.

Small Batch Jerky

We love beef jerky. Mass-produced varieties are ubiquitous and extremely high in sodium. But quality small batch options abound. Bison, Elk, Venison, or even Ahi Tuna. These are just a few of the different varieties of small batch jerky that you can take with you on your next adventure. We’ll do the research, and show you our favorites so that you can spend less time looking, and more time doing.

Packable Coffee

Instant coffee is notoriously lackluster, and sometimes even bitter to the point of offense. Packing your own coffee in can add unnecessary weight. We didn’t believe it until we’d tasted it for ourselves, but delicious, lightweight instant options exist that are sure to surprise and delight. We’ve also discovered great packable pour-overs, and traditional coffee designed specifically with portability in mind. We’ve even found an instant coffee that rivals any option that we’ve found.

story:
We want to make the trip of our lives, traveling in a small VW bug from mexico to canada, one of us is a photographer (Bernardo Figueroa) and the other is a Mountain Climber (Eduardo Ibanes). We both have been planing this trip for a long time, now the summer is the best time for us as we both are college students. We need your help, to find great places,to get donations so we can stay longer, have a nice meal, and a good night of sleep and of course TO GET GREAT PICTURES. Please follow the Instragram Acount. @berna333

We want to make the trip last about 15 days, but if the crowd found works we could make it a month!!! As you know, the bug isn't the best car for traveling, but is all we have, we will need to be prepared for everything, we have to buy auto parts to be safe, water, food. The bug will be our home for those days, we are prepared, both are outdoor lovers and want to spend all the time we can out there making great pictures and climbing great walls! THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT! we hope you love the pictures that we will make out there, to show people THE BEAUTY OF OUTDOORS LIVING.

story:
We are a small team from UCSB who are dedicated to a project that we believe will create a safer community after the wake of recent, shooting spree tragedies. Alongside our condolences to the victims, we would like to put forth something that will give us all a greater chance to protect our friends, neighbors, and loved ones from potential threats. 

The purpose of this application aims to inform communities of a volunteer network of community members and businesses who have volunteered shelter in the case of an emergency. In the case of a city-wide alert or amber alert, this voluntary system will reveal users who have volunteered a shelter closest to the current user’s location. 

Our application serves three main purposes to promote a safer environment for communities and neighborhoods: 

Allows users to volunteer their house or place of shelter as a first line of defense to repel against an active shooter, local disaster, etc. in the community.

Directs a user to the safest available shelter in the case of an emergency

Allows users to coordinate safety measures and update information through RSS feed and Messenger available on the App.

The applications of community safety currently exist in the forms of state-wide amber alerts as well as local government blog-feeds. Despite efforts to increase community safety through applications such as nextdoor.com (which allows neighbors to communicate) there needs to be an interactive system that directly protects community members. 

Since the majority of mobile users in California use apple products during everyday use, the "Always Aware," application will be trial tested for iOS users. Depending on the results of the trial test among iPhone users, we will continue to develop the application and further implement it to Android and other mobile carriers.

The application will remain FREE FOR EVERYONE to download and install on both marketplaces and all the funding received will go towards the development and awareness boost campaigns for spreading the word and getting more and more people to use the application. 

We ask for your assistance in getting us the means for the development. Your help will be much appreciated in making this project into a reality. 

Let's make this happen!

story:
Paraguay Medical Missions Trip

My name is Kathy Graham, PT. I am part of a medical missions team consisting of a Registered Nurse, Marriage/Family Child Counselor, Child Development Specialist and other professionals. Our aim with this trip is to spread the Gospel of Jesus Christ, and to serve the orphans/surrounding community with Health education and treatment.  

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5,000 to achieve this goal in order to send our team to Paraguay and bless the Orphanage with needed items such as a  stove, matresses, vitamins, and personal grooming items. Perks: Exciting news to come!

The Impact

  • Dramatically improved health for the children of the Orphanage.
  • A safer environment for the children.
  • Implementation of programs that will improve their quality of life for decades to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help us spread the word on social media.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Prayers

Thank you for your support,

Kathy Graham PT,GCS

story:
Our Campaign Has Ended.

You Can Purchase Klick Stylus Slim Pens HERE


After the successful funding of our Original Klick Stylus Pen on Kickstarter we have compiled all of the amazing feedback from our backers to release a new and improved version, this time on Indiegogo...Introducing The Klick Stylus Slim.

The Klick Stylus Slim combines a small and responsive touchscreen stylus tip and a retractable ballpoint pen on the same end of the device, allowing for a seamless transition from digital to analog use.

The small, 5mm stylus tip, works on most capacitive touchscreen devices including; smartphones, tablets, touchscreen computers and more.

Changes and updates to the design consist of the following:

  • Slimmer, Contoured & Lighter Weight Uni-body construction (no more spinning barrels!)
  • Solid unit, durable plastic clip (replacing the metal clip mounted to plastic)
  • Redesigned stylus tip (more responsive with less pressure required) PLEASE NOTE: Users with extremely thick screen protectors or cases that cover the screen may experience a slight decrease in responsiveness. While the decrease is not as drastic as the Original version it still may be an issue for some users.
  • Plastic sheathing around the retracted ballpoint tip (prevents the ballpoint tip from accidentally touching the screen if you press too hard)
  • Easier to change ink cartridges (simply unscrew the back side only)
  • Two new colors added (Green and Orange in addition to the standard Black, Blue and Red)

 

Stretch Goal Added!

When we reach $5,000 raised, we will automatically: 

ADD ONE (1) FREE Klick Stylus Slim to every perk upon shipping!

Please help us meet our stretch goal by pledging, sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Your Blog and any where else you can!

How you can help:

With funding from pre-sales and current retail sales of the Original Klick Stylus we are in need of a much smaller amount of funding this time to get the Klick Stylus Slim into production.

Only $500 is needed to cover the remaining production costs to bring the Klick Stylus Slim to market by the end of August!

We are confident that the improvements and changes made will make The Klick Stylus Slim an instant hit amongst our previous backers and the retail and wholesale markets!

We look forward to your support in helping us launch our new version of the Klick Stylus Pen, The Klick Stylus Slim and rewarding you with products in-hand by the end of August, beginning of September.

Thank you again,

Robert Morrison

Morrison Innovations

story:
What is XRange?

It is a wireless electronics development platform that provides extreme long range spread spectrum communication and has over 12km (7 miles) of usable range.

XRange is based on the SX1272 LoRa™ long range modem, low-power ARM micro-controller and powerful switching power supply.

According to Semtech's  Presentation


What can you do with XRange?

  1. Connections in warehouses where data cables and other wiring is difficult or impractical.
  2. Lighting, temperature and other building controls.
  3. Battery-powered data loggers, weather stations, and data logger/controllers.
  4. Solar panels management and monitoring.
  5. Data communication for the Internet of Things.
  6. Remote controlled irrigation systems.
  7. Point-of-sale systems.
  8. Security applications.

Why You should choose the XRange?

  1. It has extreme long range.
  2. It has ability to communicated through walls and other obstructions.
  3. It is low power.
  4. It is low cost.
  5. You can implement many wireless projects with little effort.

Features 

SX1272 LoRa™ long range modem

  • 157 dB maximum link budget
  • +20 dBm at 100 mW constant RF output
  • +14 dBm high efficiency PA
  • Programmable bit rate up to 300 kbps
  • High sensitivity: down to -137 dBm
  • Low RX current of 10 mA, 100 nA register retention
  • Fully integrated synthesizer with a resolution of 61 Hz
  • FSK, GFSK, MSK, GMSK, LoRaTM and OOK modulation
  • Packet engine up to 256 bytes with CRC

Low-power STM32L152 microcontroller

  • ARM Cortex-M3 CPU at 32MHz
  • 256 KBytes Flash
  • 2x Op-Amp
  • 12bit ADC 1 Msps 2 channels
  • 12bit DAC 2 channels
  • 2x Comparators
  • USB 2.0 Full Speed
  • Up to 2x USARTs, 2x SPIs 16Mbit/s, 2x I2C
  • Up to 11x timers
  • 96bit unique ID
  • Real-time clock 

Board Power supply (Based on TPS62160)

  • through USB bus
  • external  input voltage 3.3V – 17V
  • system voltage 3.3 or 2.7 selectable
  • output 3.3V/1A or 2.7V/1A selectable
  • output 5V from USB port

I/O Pins

  • Over-current protection on all I/O pins
  • ESD protection on USB port

MCU Flash Programming

  • USB Bootloader
  • SWD connector

Dimensions 78 mm x 42 mm


Pins Description


Battery Base Board

This board is lithium polymer battery charger (Li-Po battery is not included). When connected to the XRange, the Battery Base Board can act as a power source to the XRange and provide portability and flexibility on applications.


Range Test




Software development

We are working to provide open source libraries and firmware.

Mbed

“The mbed development platform is the fastest way to create products based on ARM microcontrollers.”

We are working to provide libraries and firmware based on Mbed platform.


Keil MDK

We have developed libraries and firmware based on Keil MDK platform.

Project Plan


Some components, especially if ordered in bulk, can have lead times up to 12 weeks, so we might need to revise our timeline if we get a very high number of orders.

XRange needs your help!

We will use the funds from the campaign to develop the final hardware and the software for Mbed support. We need support to run mass production that will lower the cost of XRange.


There are six PCB prototyping boars based on SX1272RF1BAS

You can use them to build your SX1272RF1BAS  modules.

Battery Base Board 

This board is lithium polymer battery charger (Li-Po battery is not included). When connected
to the XRange, the Battery Base Board can act as a power source to the XRange and provide portability and flexibility on applications.
